67a5(1): tsan dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig btsas so// btsas nas de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/ 
67a6(1): khye'u de'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ltar mi skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas de'i slad du/ khye'u'i ming
67a7(1): rgyal srid dga' zhes bya'o// khye'u rgyal srid dga' mam brgyad la rjes su btad do zhes bya ba nas/ rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du bskyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
67a8(1): bzhin du'o// de rgyal tshas kyi rgyal srid lam bzhag pa de'i zhang pos thos nas/ des de la pho nya btang ste/ tshig rtsub mo dang bcas pa'i spring yig spring ba/ khyod kyis sngon khas blangs shing
67b1(1): dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na de ltar legs/ gul te de skar ma bus na khyod kyis mthu dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa de sdod cig/ kho bo 'dir 'ongs na
67b2(1): yul 'khor bu ram brlag go// rgyal po de mthu chen po dang ldan pa des thos nas skrag ste/ blon rnams bsogs nas smos pa/ shes ldan dag la rgyal po des 'di skad ces
67b3(1): bsrings na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal srid dga' rgyal tsha ba de dbang bskur legs so// des smras pa shes ldan gzhon nu ches bu phor gyur
67b4(1): brgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te// nu bo rgyal srid lo dbang bskur ba 'di ni 'os pa ma yin no// de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po de'i stobs dang bzhon
67b5(1): pa rgya ches gal te 'dir mchis na gdon mi 'tshal bar yul 'khor bu ram brlag po gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas/ rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la
67b6(1): dbang bgyid par dbang bskur la gzhon nu de rnams ni spug du gsol rgyal pos smras pa shes ldan dag skyon med cing gnod pa'i gzhon rnams ji ltar spyu gA lha bdag cag ni blo na/ 
67b7(1): po lags te lha la sman par bgyi ba ltar len/ pa lags pas ston ma mchis pa dang nongs pa ma bgyis pa yang sdug la/ skyon mchis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa ni bzhag go/ 
67b8(1): rgyal pos btang snyoms su bzhag nas cang mi sba bar 'dug go/ blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ 
68a1(1): des na rgyal pos gzhon nu rnams thugs dbyung bar 'gyur ba zhig bya'o zhes de rnams kyis snyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa ri mo sna tshogs byis pa shin du
68a2(1): nga tu dri zhim po'i pog phor nye bar gzhag dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go// de nas de rnams kyis blon po
68a3(1): rnams kyis snyed mos tshal de byi dor byas pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams bskyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo // blon po rnams skyod mos tshal gyi byi dor/ 
68a4(1): byas nas sgor byung ba dang / gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa 'di su'i skyed mos tshal/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i lags so// de rnams slar bzlog par brtsams pa dang blon po rnams
68a5(1): kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shing ci'i phyir slar bzlog go// de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i skyed mos tshal yin na 'dir 'jug tu ga la rung / blon po rnams kyis smras
68a6(1): pa/ lha 'am gzhon nu rnams rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ci mchis/ de rnams nang du bzhud de rtse bar b.rams so// blon rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha skyed mos tshal legs par
68a7(1): byi dor bgyis lags kyis lha gzigs pa'i dus la bab legs so// rgyal po chas pa dang snyed mos tshayan pa ci'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa shes ldan dag
68a8(1): skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sA grag na 'di na su zhig 'dug pablon po rnams kyis sbas pa yA gzhon du rnams so// gal te de ltar na ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so// blon po rnams kyis rkang
68b1(1): pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa lnga bzod par mdzod cig gnon rnams par gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes gzhon nu rnams sdug par chad pa dang / rgyal po'i rkang pa ga
68b2(1): la gtugs nas smras pa lha gal te de lta na bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo dang lhan cig 'chin/ de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa de ltar bka' stsal po'i rigs so// rgyal pos bsgo nas de
68b3(1): rgyal pos de rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang / de rnams lhan cig chas te/ zhag bdun du grong khyer grub 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so// 
68b4(1): blon rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gal te grong khyer gyi sgom bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro// gal te de ltan sgo chod cig/ de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang
68b5(1): rang gi sring mo khrid mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye bar chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis der lo ma'i
68b6(1): spyil po dag byas te/ gnas btab nas ri dgas bsad cing bas de nas/ 'tshe ba byed cing dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dod par byed do// lang tsho dpal bab pa'i dregs
68b7(1): pas zin pas 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen te sha bri ngan pa skya bo seng gser por gyur to// ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig drang srong ser sna'i de lta bu mthong nas dris pa khyed cag ci'i phyir sku
68b8(1): ser seng por gyur/ de nams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod pa'i chags kyis shin du nyen pas so// des smras pa rang rang gi srid mo spongs la mas dbyen
69a1(1): / gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig 'dug shig/ drang srong chen po bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyid rung ngam/ shes ldan dag 'di ltar rgyal rigs kyi rgyal srid stor ba rnam
69a2(1): dalhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rnams dang de dag lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na/ bu pho dang mo dag btsas te/ 
69a3(1): de rnams chen por gyur pa dang / bsam tan gyi tsher ma ne sgra yin pas drang srong na ser skya sems rtse cig pa nyid du ma btub nas des smras pa/ shes ldan pa dag mthong zin gyis kho bo gzhan
69a4(1): du 'gro'o// drang srong chen po'i ci'i phyir bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du mi btub pas so// drang srong chen po khyed 'di nyi du bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gzhan
69a5(1): du mi cha na 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig bdag cag la phog shig/ shes ldan dag rung ngo // drang srong bdag nyid chen po rnams ni 'dod pa bzhin yin la re ba 'grub pa yin pas des gser gyi bya
69a6(1): ma dum blangs te/ chu'i rgyun gyis grong khyer gyi rnams dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi phyir gzhi yongs su btabu ser skya'i gni ser skya'i gzhi zhes
69a7(1): bya bar gyur to// de rnams deng 'phel bar gyur pas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen por gyur te dog pas 'phel chen par ma gyur to// lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes pas phyogs gan
69a8(1): zhig bstan pa dang / de rnams der dor ste/ zong khyer cig bshos brtsigs nas lhas bstan lngas ces bya bar gyur te/ de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams
69b1(1): pa shes ldan dag gi phyir bdag cag spyugs pa ni rigs mnyam pa las rlung ma blangs pa de las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blang bar mi bya
69b2(1): ste/ gcig kho nas chog shes par bya'o// de rnams rigs mnyam pa cig kho na las chung rtsa ma len gyi chung ma ni mi len to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams
69b3(1): rjes su dran nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag gzhon nu de rnams da ltag na 'dug/ de rnams kyis rgyas par smras pa/ lhas nongs pa 'ga' zhig la spags pa las de rnam
69b4(1): rang rang gis sring mo khrid de/ 'di nas mchis pan gangs kyi ri dang ni bar chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong song skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btag
69b5(1): ste/ rang rang gi sring mo spyad ste/ mas dbyen gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgu ro spyod par bgyid do// de nams rtse ba bgyid dga' mgur spyod
69b6(1): par bgyid pa na/ bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so// grong pa dag gzhon nu mas kyis de ltar byed phod dam lha rngo thog lags so// de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes pos
69b7(1): ro spyod bsrung nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni phod pa yin no// kye ma gzhon nu rnams ni shin du phod pa yin no zhes dbang chen po
69b8(1): tshig phyung ste/ kye ma gzhon du rnams ni bod pa yin no// kye me gnon du rnams ni shin du bod pa yin no zhes byas pas de rnams shA kya zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig ni
70a1(1): / rgyal po bu ram shing ba 'phags skyes pa shi nas/ rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur to// de yang bu med par shi nas skar mda' gdong rgyal srid
70a2(1): dang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go// de yang za med par shi nas lag na rgyal por gyur to// de yang bla med par shi nas gleng chen 'dul rgyal por gyur ro// de yang bu med par shi nas
70a3(1): rkang rngub can rgyal por 'gyur ro// de'i bu gnas 'jog go// go'u tam dag gnas 'jog gi bus khyim mo// go'u ta ma dag rgyal pos khyim gyi bu dang tsha bo dang yang cha dang sum cha'i
70a4(1): rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong grong khyer skya'i gzhir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang shing rta dag bcu pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang shing rgyal dang / brtan
70a5(1): pa'i shing rta dang ge 'u bcu pa dang / pha nub rgyar dang gaunu 'i du dgu bcu pa dang / gzhu rgyal dang gzhu kra dang gzhu brtan no// go'u te ma dam gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge 'gra dang
70a6(1): seng ge sla'o// go'u tam dag 'dzam bu gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na seng ge 'gram mchog tu grags so// go'u tam dag seng ge 'gram la bu ba'i ste/ zas
70a7(1): gtsang dang bzas dang b+he'o zas dang tshad med zas so// bu mo gtsang ma dang dkar mo dang bre bo mo dang tshad med ma'o// zas gtsang la gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa
70a8(1): dga'o bo'o// zas dkar la bu gnyis te tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan no// ze'o zas la bu gnyis te ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa me 'gags pa'o// tshad med/ 
70b1(1): bsal bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lngas sbyin no// gtsang ma'i ba ni legs par rab sad do// dkar po'i bu 'breng bcan no// ze'o ma'i ni bzang len 'o// tshad med
70b2(1): tshad ma'i ni dge 'brel lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni sku can 'dzin yin te/ ko ta ma dag mang pos bkur gyi hud tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcin 'dzin du rdzogs srid pa'i
70b3(1): 'phreng brgyud chang skye bo'i 'khor ba zad de/ nga ni yang srid pa med de// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen bzhengs
70b4(1): te bklags so// bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo lugal gyi zla chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po legs so legs so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis dge slong
70b5(1): rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas/ chos kyi gtam smras pa yang legs so// mo'u 'gal gyi bu yang khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs
70b6(1): rgyud las brtsams te/ chos kyi gtan rtag tu smos dang / des na de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la
70b7(1): stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi/ gtam 'chongs shig gzung shig lhog shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag
70b8(1): kya rnams sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni don dang ldan chos dang ldan pa nas tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te dge slong dag rigs kyi bu dad pas
71a1(1): rab tu byung bas/ shAkya rnams kyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing grag pa'i rigs so// de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya
71a2(1): rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yid rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
71a3(1): snga nas dong ngo // de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang
71a4(1): mi mang po gang ba 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa 'bras bu dang bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang / ba lang dang ma he
71a5(1): phun sum tshogs pa blta na sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang
71a6(1): rgyas pa dang bde ba lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa'i 'bras bu dang bu rab shing
71a7(1): gi 'phred pa dang ba lang dang mahe phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do// rgyal po legs par rab tu sad kyi btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang du ldan
71a8(1): sdug pa mangs pa yul gyi bang ma lu ming+ge zhes bya ba yid do// lus kyi stanan khyim 'dag phyus kyi nor mang sa long spyad ces yongs su gzung ba yangs shing tshum pa/ rnamathos kyi bu na
71b1(1): ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gram pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' rab me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bya sna chags
71b2(1): skad 'byin pas de'i dga' bar ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa derang rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas de na dga' 'i rtsed mo nyams su myong bar byed do// lu mI ris
71b3(1): de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes ste/ des smras pa/ lha kun dga' ba ba 'di 'gral gsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kun dga' rab 'di khyim bdag gi yin na ji ltar sbyin/ gal te/ 
71b4(1): khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzla ba gzhan zhig bya'o// de nas rgyal po legs par ra ba sad kyis lu mI ni'i ched du de bas khyad du 'phags pa'i kun dga'
71b5(1): rab zhig byed du bcug nas/ de'i ming lu mI ni'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po sed ge'i 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los sgyur ba skye bar gyur
71b6(1): kyang nI ma rung snyim pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do// rgyal po legs par rab sad la yun ring po nas kye ma'o bdag ni seng ge 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam
71b7(1): pa'adi yod do// ci tsam dus gzhan zhig ni de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa na byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo seMs can dang ldan par
71b8(1): gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu' 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba blta sdug pa mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ldan pa zhig btsas so// btsas pade'i gzugs
72a1(1): bzang pos rgyal po legs par bsad btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang lhas bstar na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te the tsom du gyur
72a2(1): pa nas/ ci 'di bu mo yin nam/ 'on te las sna tshogs pas bral pa'i sku 'phrul yin snyam mo// de bcas pa de'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun sum nyi rtsa cig tu rgya cher byas nas/ za mo 'di
72a3(1): ming cing gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lngas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang bzhi mdo'i dang gsum
72a4(1): rnams su gleng pa/ kha cig gi mchis nas ni/ 'di bu mo kho na lags te sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to zhes mchi'o// gzhan
72a5(1): dag gis mching nas 'di bu mo ma lags kyi 'o ma zhe na las sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so zhes mchi lags pas/ de bas na bu me'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes gdags so zhes de'i
72a6(1): ming sgyu 'phrul zhes bdags so// bu mo spya 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas chen mor rgyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung
72a7(1): bstan pa/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa/ du ma dang ldan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// yang de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar
72a8(1): byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo gzugs bzang bar blta na sdug pa mdzes pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so// de bcas pa na grong khyer de dag thams/ 
72b1(1): cad snang ba sna chen pos snang bar byas te/ sgyu 'phrul la ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs pa'ang ba rnam pams cad du dpyad par mi rus so// de'i bcas pa'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas
72b2(1): bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul bar 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas/ de bas na sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya bar ming
72b3(1): gdags so zhes btags so// de yang skyed srings nas chen mor gyur pa dang / de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig bca
72b4(1): bar gyur te/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes ston to// rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis/ rgyal po seng ge'i gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo gnyis zhig btsas
72b5(1): pa ni sgyu 'phrul ma dang sgyu 'phrul chen mo lags te/ de la gcig ni mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
72b6(1): 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// cig shos la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de ni 'khor los rgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan
72b7(1): gyis/ 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhon zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig/ seng ge 'gram gyis slar sting ba gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la dgos mod kyi 'on kyang rung ma 'dra ba gnyis
72b8(1): gcig la gzhag par mi bya ba/ gang la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu btsa' bar 'gyur zhing de yang 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan
73a1(1): pa de ni ri shig 'dod do// gcig shos kyang 'tshogs la brtag go// des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bsgri'o// de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi phyir skya ba seng zhes bya ba ri khrod pa dag
73a2(1): cig yod na/ shAkya rnams 'dus te/ rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas/ lha skyab seng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyis grogs mdzad du gsol/ de smras shes ldan dag
73a3(1): kho bo rgas pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so// lha gzhon nu zas gtsang btad du gsol dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu ji lta bu 'dod pa'i dam pa cig bslangs pa de sbyin
73a4(1): pa lta na btang ngo // de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal stsal par bgyi'o// rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ gzhon nu zas gtsang la sbar nas/ des ri khrod pa de rnam
73a5(1): bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg bta'o// de nas shAkya rnams mgu nas rgyal bu seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song ste/ lha gzhon sa ri khrod pa rnams/ bcom rab tu bcom ste rmeg btang lags pas/ bdag
73a6(1): cag blo dga' gzhon mchog ci bzhed gsungs shig dbul lo shes ldan dag shAkya rnams kyi khrims su bcas pa sus kyang mnyam pa las chung ma gzhag par mi bya'o// zhes bcas so// lha ci
73a7(1): khrims dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin tu bsnam gyi/ dral bar mi byed/ 'on kyang gzhonas dam pa cig slong ba ni mnyam pa las chung ma zang ba yin no// g+ha rung gis de bzhin du mdzod cig
73a8(1): de nas seng ge 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pa nyi bting nas/ de kho bos ni tshogs la brtags zin gyis bu mo tsog shos kyang spris shig/ des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang sti ste/ gnon nu ngas gtsu
73b1(1): gis gcig blangs so// ji tsam dus gzhan ni kun rgyal po seng ge 'jam shinas/ ser sna'i gzhin sbrul po zas gtsang rtul srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs
73b2(1): pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba 'thab mo dang / cod pa dang / 'gyen pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa 'bras dang bu rang shing gi 'phreng ba dang / ba lang dang ma he phun sum
73b3(1): pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid spyod do// dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen po dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi skyes pa med par dong nas/ rol mos rtse bar byed
73b4(1): dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do// 'di ni chos nyid te byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na/ 'jig rten lo gzigs pa lngas rnam par gzigs par mdzad
73b5(1): de/ rigs la gzigs pa dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / rgyud la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyuHgang yin rigs la gzigs par
73b6(1): mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i
73b7(1): rigs sam/ rgyal rigs kyi rigs su yin la de la res 'ga' ni bram ze'i rigs su btsun par bkur/ ros 'ga' ni rgyal rigs te/ do lta ni rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs
73b8(1): nas ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba ltang tsha lags so// zhes gzhi 'di ltas kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nyid
74a1(1): mtshams sbyor bar bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
74a2(1): ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dris na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis
74a3(1): yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams
74a4(1): sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras bu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa spongs mo ba brgya 'du ba mtha' khob kyi skye bo med pa dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa'i yul gang yin par
74a5(1): gzigs nas/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ dbus kyi yul 'di ni bu ram shing gi 'phreng ba dang / 'bras bu dang ba yang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa spongs mo ba brgya 'du ba/ mtha' khob kyi skye bo
74a6(1): med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyis ma la bdag gis gzhan dag byang chub sems dpal yul mtha' kho ba rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba brangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar
74a7(1): mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor bar blang bar bya'o snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsag
74a8(1): pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul la gzigs par mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa
74b1(1): rnams rgyu gang gis na dus la gzigs par ma dzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyis gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus
74b2(1): ji lta bu bzhin du 'dzam bu sring du nying mtshams smra na len snu ma na/ smre dga'i tshe lo yeng skye ban brgyad khri ba pa yan chad cing mtshams sbyor ba mi len pa/ mi rnams kyi che lo ma
74b3(1): 'grib pa brgya thub pa man chang zhing mtshams sbyor ba mi len to// byang chub sems dpa' sku gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yang tshad nyid mtshams sbyor ba mi len ce na/ minam
74b4(1): kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na yid dbyung bar dga' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' blun ning dbang po rtul ba dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bas bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 
74b5(1): mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga'o// 'di lta ste tshe'i snyigs ma dang nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i sdigs ma dus kyi sdig
74b6(1): ma shas chen yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' snyigs ma lA shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/ 
74b7(1): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu mo yin
74b8(1): pas rgyu 'dis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dus la gzigs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' gru gang gis rgyud la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas/ 
75a1(1): na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing
75a2(1): ma mes bzung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med par gzigs na sa/ de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ shAkya'i rigs rgyud 'di ni btsun par bkur ba yin zhing mang pos bkur ba nas bzung
75a3(1): ste/ spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyis/ me la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa rgyud ngan pa la nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so// zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag
75a4(1): gis rgyal po zas gtsang gi rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo // ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad bar mi 'gyur pa'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas
75a5(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pa rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud la gzigs pa mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis
75a6(1): bud med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni 'di snyam du dgongs ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nyid
75a7(1): mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa rigs dang ldan pa/ rgod bag can ma yin la/ rigs la bar 'gyur zhing / sngon gyi
75a8(1): sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma'o bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu rum du 'dzin nus paM dang / rang gi don yang sems
75b1(1): par mi byed pa yin par gzigs nas/ 'di snyam du dgongs ste sgyu 'phrul ma chen mo 'di ni ma mes dang pha mes bzung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la sbyor med cing gzugs dang ldan pa dang / tshul dang
75b2(1): ldan dang / rgod bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rume zla ba bcur 'dzin rus pa dang / gang gi don yang mi nyams pa yin la/ 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen
75b3(1): chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi sum du gyur cig ces sngon lam btab pa gang yin pas bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med
75b4(1): rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so zhes gzhi 'dis kha zeng bar mo 'gyur ro snyam mo// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' snang bar mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bstsags pa dang / sangs rgyas
75b5(1): 'das rnams ni chos ze shed pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med la gzigs par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa gzigs pa lngas
75b6(1): gzigs nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug la/ lan gsum du bsgrags pa grogs po dag dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris 'di nas re shi 'phro k+Shau te/ mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po zas gtsang
75b7(1): gi chung ma dam pa'i rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs la/ de'i bur gyur te/ bdud rtsir rtogs par byas/ khyod cag las gang dag bdu de rtsi don du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbus
75b8(1): kyi mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba longs shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// byang
76a1(1): chub sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod cig/ da ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye dgu ni ma rung ba'i bsam pa can/ 'dzam bu gling ni rtog ge
76a2(1): pa drug dang / rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / snyoms par 'jug pa drug gis skyugs pa lags so// de la rtog gi pa drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste 'od srung rngos byed dang kun tu rgyu gnag
76a3(1): lhas kyi bu dang smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / ka t+ya'i bu gnog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o// rjes su sgrogs pa drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste bram ze rgyus
76a4(1): rgal dang bram ze rnam rdeg dang / bram ze bzang ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad+ma'i snying po dang / bram ze dmar po'o// snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di
76a5(1): lta ste rang sa byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur dang / kun tu rgyu legs bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u kun rgyal dang / drang srong ma bcings pa dang / lteng rgyas
76a6(1): 'od srungs ral pa can no// 'dir ni chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i gdan dpag mang gnyis pa bsham pa bgyi ni bdag ts+tshag 'di snyam du bdag cag lnga dga' ldan
76a7(1): gyi gnas la byang byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas/ chos bshad de chos de bdag cag gis thos nas ci nas kyang bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang spen pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba
76a8(1): de lta de ltar bsgrub par bgyi bar sems legs so// de skad ces smras pa/ dang / byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag
76b1(1): de'i phyir rol mo'i cha byang thams cad brdungs zhing / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad brdungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te smras pa/ 
76b2(1): grogs po 'di la sgra lhag par gang che/ bcom ldan 'das drang gi sgra lags so// grogs po dag ji ltang dung gi sngas rol mo'i cha spyad thams cad zil gyis mnan te gnas pa de bzhin du ngas
76b3(1): kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang rjes su sgrogs pa drug dang / stobs par 'jug pa drug zil gyis mnan nas/ bdud rtsi rtogs par byas ste/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o// 
76b4(1): mi rtag pa'i dang bud par bya'o// stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o// bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgo bsgrags par bya'o zhes smras nas/ tshogs su bcad de smras pa/ seng ge gcig gis gcan
76b5(1): zan tshegs ni du mjoms/ rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig brgya byin gcig gis lha ma yin dbang du ma 'joms/ nyi ma gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel// grogs pa
76b6(1): ngag khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer bde/ yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu ning mtshams sbyor ba longs shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sem
76b7(1): te byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das 'di ni btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor ba la/ len par bzhed kyis/ ma la bdag gis de la gzi brjid bsgrub par
76b8(1): bgyi'o// ltams nas sbyang bar bya'o// snyam nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing lhums kyang gtsang mar byas byas so/ 
78a1(1): ma dang sha mi dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma 'gags so// dper na nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi gos dang / ka shi'i ras
78a2(1): kyang nor bu rin po ches mi dgos pa de bzhin du/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na mdzod kyi nang du rdzas gzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag
78a3(1): gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma 'bags so// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums de tham
78a4(1): rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo // dper na nor bu bai DUrar+ya zur brgyad pa bzang po rigs dang ldan pa dang gsal ba/ dri ma med pa mtshon skad sna lnga/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po
78a5(1): le brgan la brgyus pa/ de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na/ 'di ni skud pa'o// 'di ni nor bu'o// skud pa 'di la no bu brgyus pa yin no zhes shes pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das gang
78a6(1): gi tshe yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bzhugs pa mthong ngo // chos nyid kyis bing gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yul gyi lhums na 'ug
78a7(1): pa de'i tshe/ de'i yum 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas/ lus dub par 'gyur ba med do// chos nyid kyis gang tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na zhugs pa de
78a8(1): tshe yum de phan chad byo ji srid 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi lnga blang bar gyur te/ ji srid 'tshe'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog go// ma byin par len pa dang mi tshangs
78b1(1): par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smras pa dang / snang ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i char myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ sbyar ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur babag med pa'i gnas
78b2(1): lus slar bzlog par byed do// sog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang / brdzun mi sbas dang chang la mi skam dang / khrig pa mi tshangs spyod pa spong ba 'di/ 'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin/ na
78b3(1): nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums ma zhugs pa'i ngo tshe yum 'di lta ste/ skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtong ba med do// nyon mongs pa
78b4(1): rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing / 'di ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la/ de yum 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa'i skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtong ba med/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod
78b5(1): pa skyed pa na kye ma bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chub tung ngo snyam nas/ des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal po zos gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun
78b6(1): mo 'di lta bu'i 'dod pa skye/ mkhan rnams kyis lha btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa zhig bltam par gyur te/ de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i mtshon than
78b7(1): dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan to rgyal pos sbas pa gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blung na cing 'gyur/ sras yan lag mtshang ba zhig bcas par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ 
78b8(1): ming bas gtsang zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag mtshang bar bya'am/ de'i tshe mong khye ste'i gzhin kun tu mig dam shes bya ba mig 'phrul byang bzhig 'dug pade/ rgyal pos bkrug nas bsgom
79a1(1): das des de steng gi khang bzangs kyi khang gzhin 'jug pa la rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bstan te/ chu blang ba dang / de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gnan
79a2(1): yang de'i 'dod pa skyes/ kye ma brtson thams cad thar bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal pos bcon thams cad thar bar byas nas/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang
79a3(1): de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma sbyin pa dag byin bsod nams dag bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal pos sbyin pa dag byin bsod nams dag byas nas/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur
79a4(1): to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa kye ma bdag gis skyed mos tshal bstan nas/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa kye ma bdag skyed
79a5(1): mos tshal du 'dug par bya'o snyam pa dang / rgyal po legs par rab gsad la lum+bi ni'i tshal zhes bya ba'i snyed mos tshal yod nas/ de la rgyal po zas gtsang gis spring ba/ khyod kyi bu mo skyes mo tshol
79a6(1): du 'gro bar 'dod kyis bskyod mos tshal byi dor byos shog/ des zho shas 'tshe ba dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag snyed mos tshal byi dor byos shig/ de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa dang / de nas
79a7(1): de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig dong ngo // de nas lum+bi ni'i tshal du 'chag pa na shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog shin tu rgyas pa zhig mthong ngo // de bltam par 'dod nas de la bzung ste/ 'dug pa dang / lha rnams
79a8(1): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa byang chub sems da'i yum ni ngoshes pa dang ldan nam bskye bo'i tshogs chen pos bskor na bltam mi thod kyis thabs shig bsham par rgyan snyam nas des rlung da / 
79b1(1): chad pa rag masprul nas/ des skye bo'i tshogs de kun thos so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po byin gyis bdag nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mos mdun du bdu
79b2(1): pa dang / des bildum par brtsams so// byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa dang / bam+b+hi byin gyis pas pa'i slebs mos bzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ brgyu
79b3(1): byin 'di bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' blangs so zhes dregs par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas bdag nyid rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dar bar gyur to// 
79b4(1): byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka thong shig thong shig/ par song shig/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de'i yang sa chen
79b5(1): po 'di g.yos par gyur ces bya ba nas/ shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so// shes ldan dag sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
79b6(1): du'o// 'dul ba gzhi/ dum bu bzhi pa/ bam po brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa// // chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas
79b7(1): ldum pa na/ ral gri thubs nas tshul bzhin du mdas kyi dri ma dang / shama'i drim dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / migatsang ba gnan sna tshogs kyis mi gos so/ chos nyid kyis ga
79b8(1): gi rmi byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bzhum pa'i tshe de'i yum mi dub mi nyal te/ 'greng bzhin du N+Da la rigs ma ngas rgyal rigs bltam byed do// chos
80a1(1): nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la sus kyang ma bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzigasmra nas gom par bdun bdum 'dor zhing tshig tu yang
80a2(1): gsung ba 'di ni shar phyogs yin te/ mya ngan 'das pa'i thog mang 'gro bar bya'o// 'di ni lha phyogs yin te 'gro ba mtha' dag gi yon gnas su gyur par bya'o// 'di ni nub phyog
80a3(1): yin te nga'i skye ba'i mtha' ma ni 'di yin par 'gyur ro// 'di ni byang phyogs yin te/ srid pa'i mtsho las rgal bar bya'o// de'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po dang
80a4(1): rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la bar snang las chu bsil ba cig dang chu dron po cig ste/ chu gnyis kyi rgyun si
80a5(1): gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing des byang chub sems dpa' la 'khrus mdzad do// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la skrun pa'i yum gyi mdun chu mig chen po
80a6(1): 'phyang nas 'bab par gyur to// de la do'i yum chus chu'i bya ba byed do// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la/ lhas pari snang las lha'i ut+pa la dang / pad+ma
80a7(1): dang kr-i mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i 'dab nas 'thor ro// lha'i me to mad+hA ras kyang 'thor ro// 
80a8(1): lha'i sol snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin to// gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do// bar sdom la/ bltam dang bzhengs dang gom pa bdun/ chu rgyun gnyis dang chu mig lha/ gang gi tshe byang chub
80b1(1): sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bltam pa de nyid kyi/ rgyal po bzhi'i yang su btsas te/ mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis phur tshangs sbyin gyi zla bcas pa na de 'di snyam du
80b2(1): sems te/ bdag gi su bcas pa ni yim gsal ba gsal bzhin du snang bas de bas ma 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar btags so// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po
80b3(1): pad+ma chen po'i bu bcas pa na de 'di snyam du sos te/ bdag gi su bcas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar bltar snang zhing gzugs can mo'i bu yin pas 'di'i ming gzugs can
80b4(1): snying po zhes bya bar btags so// kau sha m+bin rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu bcas pa na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gri bu bcas pa na 'jig rten nyi ma sher ba bzhin snang bar gyur pa
80b5(1): 'di'i ming brah+ma snang zhes b+hA bar btags so// grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rtul po chu khrud mtha' yas kyi bu bcas pa na de 'di snyam sems te bdag gis btsas pa na 'jig rten sprin ma snang
80b6(1): ba lta bur gyur pas 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar btag so// de ni de lta ma yin no// 'on kyang de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no// ri bo kun 'dzin la dran srong nyon
80b7(1): mongs med ces bya ba 'jig pa la mkhas pa/ chags pa la mkhas pa zhig gnas te/ de'i mngon mos byin zhes bya'o// des de la dus dus su 'jig gtam dang chags
80b8(1): pa'i gtam sbas pas/ de de las rab tu byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa na 'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/ de'i tshe mis
81a1(1): sbyin phug tu zhugs te/ bsam gtan byed pa nas des snang ba de mthong nas nyon mongs med la smras pa mkhan po// 'dir ni nyi ma tham cad dag/ ci car byung bar
81a2(1): gyur ta ma ci// ji ltar nI phug bcas pa// 'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur// nyon mongs med kyis de la sbas pa/ nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun tu rno// bu cig snang ba 'di dag ni// yan lag reg na
81a3(1): 'od bsal bas// nges par thub pa de'i 'od// byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen ni// nges par lhums nas bltam gyur la// bltam nas sems dpa' chen po de'i// 'od gzer ba dang 'dra ba ni// / 
81a4(1): dri ma med pa 'di dag gis// 'jig rten gsum ni snang bar byas// mis sbyin gyis smras pa// mkhan po bdag byang chub sems dpa' bltar mchi'o// des smras pa/ bu da ltar byang chub sems dpa
81a5(1): dbang che ba'i lha rnams kyis bskor cing bzhugs pas gang yang bag cag gis skabs mi rnyed pa'i gnas 'di yod do// gang gis tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir
81a6(1): byon pa nas/ de'i ming 'dogs pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag blta ba'i phyir 'dod do// gang gi tshe nyi ma kho na la byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltam pa de nyid kyi ma kho na las rgyal po
81a7(1): zas gtsang gi rim gro ba rnams las 'dun pa la sogs te lnga brgya dang / rim gro pa rnams las 'dun pa la sogs te lnga brgya btsas so// bal gyi glang po che lnga brgya dang rta rgod ma brgya yang
81a8(1): 'azangs so// gter lnga brgya'i kha yang nye bar snang ngo // khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis kyang dpya phul te/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / rgyal
81b1(1): bos bsams pa bdag gi bu btsas pa ni don thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas gzhon nu'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes pagadags so zhes
81b2(1): de na byang chub sems dpa' la ming 'di thog mar btags te/ 'di lta ste don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o// grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel zhes bya ba zhig nyug
81b3(1): mar gnas so// shAkya rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni shAkya su yang rung ba la lde'u 'am/ bu mo bcas pa gang yin pa de gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du gzhug pa'i
81b4(1): phyir khrid pa yin pas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la tA gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa laM phyag 'tshal du chug shig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal
81b5(1): zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la nyan nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du byang chub sems dpa' bzhag nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par
81b6(1): brtsams pa na/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya gtum po gzu lums can/  rtsub pa tsum pa med pa rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' nang du zhugs pa na/  thub pa bzhin du gnas pa blon po
81b7(1): rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa ser skya'i gzhi shAkya 'di rnams ni gtum po gzu lums can/ btsum pa med pa yin na/ gzhon/ 
81b8(1): nu nang du zhugs pa na/ thub pa bzhin du gnas pas gzho nu'i ming shAkya thub zhes de nas byang chub sems dpa'i ming gnyis btags pa 'di lta ste/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o// byang
82a1(1): chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel ba gyi gnas dang nye ba zhig tu byon pa dang / gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas dang nye bar phyin
82a2(1): pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis rgyal po gtsang la smras pa lha gnod sbyin shAkya
82a3(1): 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs la gA so// rgyal pos thos nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag lhas kyang gzhon nu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa/ 'di ni lha'i yang
82a4(1): 'di ni lha'i yang lha yin pas de bas na gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes gdags so zhes de nas byang chub sems dpa'i ming gsum pa gtags pa 'di lta ste/ lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o// byang
82a5(1): chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la yab dang yum gyis ma ma rnams la gtad nas ma ma khyod kyis gzhon dus dus su skra mnye byos shig/ dus dus su khrus byos shig/ dus dus
82a6(1): su zas byin cig/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bden pas bsnyen bkur byos shog/ ma ma dga' ba'i lag pa gnyis kyi de blangs nas/ dus dus su skra mnye byed/ dus dus su khrus byed/ 
82a7(1): dus dus su zas sbyin/ dus dus su yang dag pa'i bden pas bsnyen bkur byed do// yang de'i tshe dri shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de rnams kyis byugs shing thams cad kyis
82a8(1): brgyan nas yab pas gtsang la phul ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te/ pad du bzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' bskyed do// chos nyid kyi byang chub sems dpa' bltam
82b1(1): bA'i mod la yab dang sum gyis ma thu mkhan dang rdzas mkhan gyis bram ze de napas la na par stor pa yin pas shes ldan dag cigang dag dang ldan pam smos su thurnam po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur
82b2(1): gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no// gal te khyim na gnas par gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur
82b3(1): te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag byung ste/ 'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / 
82b4(1): khyim bdag rin po ched de/ bdun pa ni blon po rin po che'o// bu dpa' ba brtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde 'joms pa/ de rgya mtsho la 'thug pa'i
82b5(1): sa chen po ma lus par gnon par/ sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa/ 'di nyid 'chad pa med cing mtshon kyis 'da' ba med la/ chos dang mthun pas lags par phab ste/ gnas par 'gyur ro// 
82b6(1): gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
82b7(1): sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan no// shes ldan dag gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis
82b8(1): su 'gyul pa'i gzhan du ni ma yin na zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'ji gdon du spam pa thachags par 'gyur ces bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtsham sum su rtse gnas pa gang dag yin/ ldan
83a1(1): zhabs shin tu gnas pa lags so// zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'bab ste/ lha 'di ni gzhona'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu'i mtshan
83a2(1): lags so// de'i zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis la 'khor lo brtsibs stong lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa rnam partsa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes
83a3(1): bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon ni sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs drang / de'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon shA chags pa lags te/ phyag dang / 
83a4(1): zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin no// lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags
83a5(1): soHta lha gzhon nu'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'grel pa lags te/ de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa ni/ dben ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu bzhin no// lha 'di ni gzho nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes
83a6(1): chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhon nu'i zhabs long bu'i tshigs la mngon pa dang / byin pa ri drags e n+ya ya'i lta bu dang skum dud pa dang / sku bzhed bzhin du mdud par phyag pus mo'i lha nga gnyis su
83a7(1): slebs shing reg pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum lags so// lha gzhon nu mdoms kyi sra ba sbub su nub pa/ legs te/ de'i mdoms kyi sba ba sbub su
83a8(1): nub pa ni/ dper na glang po che cang shes kyi 'am/ rta cang shes kyi byung ma thag gi bzhin no// lha 'di ni gzho nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gno nu'i sku ni ji srid
83b1(1): bar 'dom yang de snyid la 'dum/ de srid pang pang stsa ya de med pa shing na kro d+ha swA rgyu na gas pa lags te/ lha 'dzin gnona'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// 
83b2(1): lha gzhona'i sgra ro snod kyi spu re re nas skye zhing de'i sku la skya re re nas skye ba yang mthing ka la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar skye lags te/ lha 'di ni gno nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i
83b3(1): mtshan legs so// lha gzhona'i mdog gser 'dra ba dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang lpags pa srab cing mdog gser 'dra ba lags te/ lpags pa sab pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sku
83b4(1): la mi gos pa ste/ lha 'di ni gzhona'o sgros bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhonu'i sgra ni mdun mtho ba skye/ sku mdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni phyag gnyis dang zhabs
83b5(1): gnyis dang par dpung mgo gnyis dang lhag pa lags te/ lnga 'di ni gzhona'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lho gzhina'i thal gong rgyas pa dang sku seng ge'i 'dra ba dang
83b6(1): sku drung zhing kho lag che ba dang / dpud mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / tshems pa'i bcu mnga' ba dang tshems mnyam pa dang tshems thags bzang ba dang / mche ba shin du dkar ba dang / 'gram pa
83b7(1): song ge 'dra ba dang / ro'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/ lha 'di ni gno nu'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhona'i ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa lags te/ 
83b8(1): ljags shin du ring ba dang srab pa nyid kyi phyir lngag na zhal nas byung bas sna mtshanas nas bzung sta nal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du log par mdzad pa ste/ lha 'di ni gnon na/ 
84a1(1): le/ nona'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtsham lags so// lha gzhon ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang kA la bing+ka'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / rnga'i dbang
84a2(1): can lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhona'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha gzhona'i spyan mthon 'thid la/ ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang dbu gtsug gtor dang ldan pa
84a3(1): dang / smin mtshams kyi marjod spu dang ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil pa lags te/ lha 'di ni gzhona'i skyes bu chen po'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so// lha 'di dag gang / 
84a4(1): dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma lags pa zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu
84a5(1): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so// gal te gzho nu rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor los gyur pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// chos nyid
84a6(1): kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ba ldam nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / de skrun pa'i yum nongs par gyur te/ nongs ma thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris gya nom par
84a7(1): skye bar gyur ro// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das la lha'i kha dog thob pa skyes pa
84a8(1): dang bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shos shor dga' ba thob ste/ dper na 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser la ma gar ba mkhas pas rgyas brdungs pa/ la ba dkor po
84b1(1): sar pa'i steng du gzhag na shin tu bsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa mi'i kha
84b2(1): dog las 'das shing / lha'i kha dog bya yin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'ong bar gyur
84b3(1): to// ste/ bo'i tshogs chen po de phrag pa nas zag par sbed pa ni dper na ston ka'i pad+ma'i tshogs chen po sIng du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la
84b4(1): lag pa nas lag par rgyud par byed pa de de bzhin du snga ma bzhin no// bar sdom la/ mig mi 'dzums dang rnam par smin// gsung snyan 'joms pa mkhas pas
84b5(1): sdus/ chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod la spyan mi 'dzums par gzugs rnams la blta ste/ de spyan mi 'dzums pa ni dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi/ 
84b6(1): lho rnams bzhin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan dang ldan pas des na de nyin dang
84b7(1): mtshan du dpag tshad gcig khor khor yug du gzigs so// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'joms pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / 
84b8(1): gsung yid du 'ong bar nA te dper na gangs can gyi bya skad snyan cing 'dzes pa dang / snyan pa dang yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas snyan cing
85a1(1): 'joms pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' ba lam pa'i mdo nas mkhas pa/ 
85a2(1): gsal bar yid zhungs pa rgyud las byung ba'i shes rab spyod pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang gi dgos pa'i ched la 'dug rtenas don zab mo'i tshig dang
85a3(1): yi ge dag shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do// de nas mis byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' ser skya'i gzhir byon nas/ de'i tshe mtshan gsum
85a4(1): btags kyis nga ni byang chub sems dpa' blta ba'i phyir bzhud do// des smras pa de bzhin bya'o zhes de gnyis chas pas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul nyams nas
85a5(1): nas rkang pa kho nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zhugs nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi khyim gyi skor gson pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis/ sgo srungs kyi ma la smras pa/ 
85a6(1): kye nang rje song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong nyon mongs med lnga'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sdod cing mchis so// gsol cig/ de song nas rgyal pos rig par byas
85a7(1): pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa dang / shes ldan nyon mongs med la su zhig 'gog nang du zhugs shig/ de zhugs pa dang rgyal po zas gtsang gis bkur sti sngon du 'gro ba'i
85a8(1): mchod yon sbreng ba mchod nas/ stan blta bas te 'dug pa dang rgyal po zas gtsang gis bshes pa'i dga' bar byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po dgos pa ci zhig
85b1(1): la 'ongs des smras pa/ rgyal po bdag cag 'dir mchis pa/ khyod kyi sas ni mthong bar 'tshal/ 'jig rten gtso bo rnams 'dren pa/ thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal/ rgyal po smras pa/ 
85b2(1): gal te de ltar gzhon nyal gyis ma sad kyi bar du re shig sdod cig/ des smras pa/ lha brnal ba nyid blta'o de bzhin gyis shig/ des ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' mig btsums shing mig
85b3(1): mi 'dzums par gzug rnams la blta bar mthong nas/ des tshig su bcad de smras pa/ rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni/ mtshan mo'i bzhi mnyal ba ltar/ dgos pa don gnyer rnams kyi nyid// mig
85b4(1): la yun ring mi gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bltam pa'i mod nas mams pang du blangs nas drang srong la byin pa dang drang srong nyon mongs med byis lag pa gnyis kyi blangs nas yud tsam zhig brtags te smras
85b5(1): pa/ lha gzhon mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkham gyi zam pa rnams la bstan pa lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa bstan to// de rnam kyis ji skad lung bstan 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten du
85b6(1): sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas drang srong nyon mongs red kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te// brtsed
85b7(1): pa'i dus na 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung / bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di ni nyis las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/ mtshan mi gsal ba dang ldan mi dbang po// gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag
85b8(1): po dbang phyug 'gyur/ thub dbang mtshan ni shin tu gsal bas na// mi mchog sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo sbyar/ zhes smras nas/ bdag nyid kyi tshe'i mtha' dang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byang/ 
85b9(1): chub li'i brtag par zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu zhes nas khab nas byung nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod par 'gyur to// de nas bdud rtsi'i rtogs
87a1(1): phan tshun nyul zhing bltar 'dod pa'i gnas shig btsal nas phyogs zhig tu 'dug go// de nas de lam gyis du ba pa ngal sos te/ bsam gtan bsred nas// 
87a2(1): rdzu 'phrul yang bskyed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong nyon mongs med nad kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa ba dang lo ma dang / me tog deng 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur nas/ 'on kyang
87a3(1): byang thub par gyur to// de nas mi de'i lus kyi gnas rnams brtags nas sbas pa/ mkhan po bdag cag cung zad rab tu byung ba tham cad ni bdud rtsi'i ched dang bdud rtsi gsal ba'i phyir la gra na/ 
87a4(1): gal te mkhan pas bdud rtsi rtogs par gyur na/ bdud rtsi de las bdag cag la yang bgos shig/ des sbas pa bram ze'i khye'u kho bo yang cung zad rab tu byung ba de tham cad bdud rtsi'i ched dang bdud dru
87a5(1): ba'i phyir yin na kha bas kyang ma rdegs so// de lta mod kyi shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhan gang yin pa des bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur zhing bdud rtsis kyang 'gro ba 'chim par byed par 'gyur gyis den
87a6(1): dru bu rab tu byung shig/ khyod rab tu byung nas rig brjod par mi bya/ dus brjod par mi bya/ bram ze'i khye'u brjed par mi bya ste/ rab tu byung nas kyang tshangs par spyod pab pa 'a zhig sred par bya zhing bdud
87a7(1): tshig par bye bo'i phyir bkren par bya'o// de nas khyod kyis bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur nos smras nas/ tshagasu bcad de sbas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod na/ shar gyi phyogasu khyod 'dug da // 
87a8(1): yang dag sangs rgyas grags ldan pa// brnyed par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur// bsags pa kun gyi mtha' bzad cing // mthon pa rnams ni mtha' lung 'gyur// 'brang ba'i mtha' ni bral ba ste/ 
87a9(1): gson pa'i mtha' na 'chi ba yin// zhes sbas te dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to// de nas mis byin gyis de'i lus la lus kyi mchod pa byas nas dza ra tsA sir song ste gnas so// de de la bram mo'i khye'u
87b1(1): lnga brgyal bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug ga/ mis byin gyi ming ka t+ya yan yin pas de'i ming ka t+ya ya na'i bu t+ya'i bu zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par
87b2(1): byang chub pa na sman sngar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis ka t+ya'i bu de la gdams ngag phog nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsngal te/ shin tu mthar byin pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan
87b3(1): les 'ongs par 'jog par 'gyur te/ de'i mang ni ka t+ya'i bu chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur to// de nas ngas gzhan zhig na byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring po ma lon por ma ma'i bang du zhugs
87b4(1): nas gser gyi zhong par 'azas dang shar sbas pa'i chen gsol ba na/ de mams bkag kyang ma thub par mang por gsal nas/ 'brog par brtsams pa dang / 'jog ma nas nas des rgyal po zas
87b5(1): gtsang la sbran pa dang / rgyal po btsun mo dang lhan cig gis 'phrog par brtsams pa dang / des kyang ma nus so// de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams dang ser skyan gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams
87b6(1): ston de rnams kyis kyang 'phrog mi nus so// de nas glang po che lnga brgyal btags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsams pa 'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs rnams na mi rung gis/ mal bdag gis
87b7(1): mdzum mo bkug pas gser gi gzhed pa nas bzung ngo snyam nas des mdzub mo bkug bas gser gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang / glang po che lnga brgya po do dag kha phyir bsnur te drangs nas/ 
87b8(1): de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong pa 'phrog par ma nus so// rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas glang po che lnga brgya drangs pa dang / sbyar na/ 
87b9(1): dag na sa srung gags nas kyis mang bcu bgyis/ de bas na min nu thang mchog pa chag pas can zhes padams mi par tham la kye'u dang zeng ma dag dang na/ sib yang bzangs zhid dang ni/ 
88a1(1): gdang ba mtshon can dge ba'i snying // dmag dang btsun mo rnams yin no// rgyas nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga brgya dang / yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go cha la yi ge/ 
88a2(1): slob par btang nas/ yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go chos byang chub sems dpa' la yi ge bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di ni ngas shes de nas yi ge gnyis dang gsuman
88a3(1): de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas bag pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di dag kyang ngas shes kyi gzhan dag smos shig/ srin bu go chas sbas pa/ 'jig rten na yi ge 'di tsam spyad pan/ 
88a4(1): ni bdag gis ma 'chal te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' yi ge bris te srin bu ga chal byin nas gsungs g.yi ga 'di'i ming ci yin sbas shig/ des smras pa la 'tshul to// byang chub
88a5(1): sems dpas/ spangs pa/ 'jig rten tu gnyis shig byung na yi ge 'di mngon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' dang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yi ge
88a6(1): de rlangs pa'i dbyangs kyis klags la nam pa'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas dbang byas pas tshangs pa'i yi ge tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya bar gyur to// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'am
88a7(1): ge'i mthar phyin pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i nang po bzang len zhes bya ba des zang ba'i gzha' bar ldan pa bsrabs nas// 'bang gi sgrub dpo m+bu rlung bsas zhes bya dngos 'khor
88a8(1): gcong pa la slob pa la zhugs pa ma dazang len gyis lngar bcas la smras su/ byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin du bzhon gzhan dag ni snying rje can yin pas byas par bra ba thams cadas pa 'i
88a9(1): zhig 'gyu 'dzin sugang las byeng pa las 'ang zhin thams cad 'i band par gyur dang ma rung gis 'das gning du mi bsan cig gang sa cha byang chub sems dga' ba ma pa 'am sa// 
88b1(1): cad la legs par sabs pas gnas lnga po 'angs sa/ chung nas bag pa dang / sna zag par phog pa dang / gzhan du phog pa dang / mi 'chor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che bdag la yang byang bar
88b2(1): gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs kun tu sgra grags pa shAkya rnams kyi nang du rung ba'i gzhon zhes bya ba nas sgra zag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi la
88b3(1): byi rnams kyis glang po tshe mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas/ de rnams kyis bsams pa rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor les sbyar ba'i rgyal por 'gyuraro zhes
88b4(1): lung bstan pa de'i mthus glang po rin po che 'di byang gis/ dong la de kho na la dbul lo snyam nas/ de rnams kyis glang po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de dong ba las rim gyis ser
88b5(1): s+ya'i gzhir byin nas/ rgyal po'i pho zang gi sgor glang po che dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang / ma stes de gdug pa'i las can lha sbyin phyir byung ba des/ glang po che dam bde de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan
88b6(1): ba mthong nas/ des de phrag dog chen po skyes te/ de brag dag dang mi bzod pa skyes pas dris pa/ glang ba tshe dam pa 'di su'i yon// de rnams kyi smras pa/ gzhan nu shAkya thub pa mtshan mkhan rnam
88b7(1): kyis 'khor las sbyar ba'i rgyal bar lung bstan de la yangs pa can gyi tshogs rnams kyis glang po che 'di ni skyes su phul lo// lha sbyin lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas sbas pa/ 
88b8(1): re shig de 'khor los sgyur bar ma gyur pas de khyed cag de la glang po che 'bul lam zhes sbas nas/ tha lug gis glang po che bsad do/ ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs
88b9(1): pa des de mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag glang po che bzang po 'di sus bsad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis so// nges pasams pa gnon mi za bar 'di la lhas
89a1(1): sbyin gyi mthus/ bsad kyis mal bdag gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam nas mjug ma nas bzung ste/ dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur bar de mtha' cig tu bor ro// 
89a2(1): ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa/ glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smra so// sus bsad/ lha sbyin gyis so// mgron
89a3(1): rnams la mgron gi mchod pa zhig bya ba yin na ma legs pa zhig byas so// phyogs gang du bsad/ 'o nar ro// 'di sus khyer te 'ongs/ dga' bos so// de dgongs pa gdon mi za bar de gnyis kyis// 
89a4(1): 'dil mthu sad kyis mal das 'di la mthu sad par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas mjug ma nas bzung ste/ ra ba'i khar 'phangs pa las ra ba rim pa bdun dang 'obs bdun las bzlas te
89a5(1): bor ro// de lhung gshongs btod pa/ glang po che'i gshongs glang po che'i gshongs zhes bya bar 'gyur to/ der bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mchod rten brtsigs pas
89a6(1): deng seng du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag byed pa dag byed do// 'dir smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsad// dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du khyer/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 
89a7(1): phyag gis bar snang la// rdo ba bzhin du phyir lo rgyang ring 'phangs/ gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/ gcod pa byed du 'dong ngo zhes de rnams phyir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya
89a8(1): grub pas kyang gnas nas 'khor lnga brgya dang gcod pa byed du phyir byung ngo // gzhon nu rnams la 'bras rnga ba bzhin du gcod pa byed do// de rnams kyis shing gcad cing bcad pa rnams
89b1(1): 'gyel to// byang chub sems dpa' ni ze'i kha gcod pa'i gcod par mdzad de/ des shing bcad cing bcad pa rnams ma 'gyel te/ de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / gzhon rnams kyis
89b2(1): smras pa/ shes ldan dag byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa stobs dang ldan zhing gnas lnga la byang ngo zhes zos nas 'di gcod pa byed pa yang mi shes pa las na 'di bdag cag
89b3(1): pas stobs dang ldan pa ni ma yin no// 'di ltar bdag cag gis shing gang dag bcad pa de dag thams cad ni 'gyel la/ 'dis gang dag bcad pa de dag ni de bzhin du 'dug go// 
89b4(1): de nas byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas shing mthu shAkya thub pa mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu dang bza
89b5(1): la byang ba ma shes pas byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas shing mthul smod par 'gyur gyis de la thabs shig bsham par bya'i snyam nas/ des de dang mthun pa'i rlung zhig btang
89b6(1): bas/ des shing de dag thams cad chem chem zer tres 'gyel te/ shAkya rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyeso// de rnams tshangs byed pa la zhugs te/ de rnams kyis de
89b7(1): 'ben du lcags kyi ti la bdun dang rnga dang phag btsugs so// lha sbyin gyis rkang zabs byas te lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang / lcags kyi shing ta la cig phigs so// byang chub
89b8(1): sems dbu grags mda' 'phangs pa dang / shing ta la bdun dang rnga dang phag las bral nas lcags kyi mnga' de sa la zug pa klus phyung ba dang chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung nA/ 
90a1(1): de la skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'thung bar brtsab so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis der mchod rten brtsigs ste/ deng sang du yang dge slong mchod
90a2(1): rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag byed do// gzhon nu rnams shing rtar zhugs nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs pa dang mtshan mkhan grong khyer nas phyir byung ba de/ rnams kyis gzhon nu shA
90a3(1): thub pa shing rtar zhugs nas nang du zhugs pa la lung bstan pa/ gal te 'di lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ gdon ma za bar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// 
90a4(1): rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to// zhes thos so zos nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ shAkya rnams bsogs nas smras
90a5(1): pa/ shes ldan dag mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te gzhon nu lo bcu gnyi su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa kho bas
90a6(1): zos// gzhon nu 'di gal te lo bcu gnyis rab tu ma byung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na bdag na mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling bzhir phyi bzhin dong gis 'di khyim phu/ 
90a7(1): shig/ zor po rnams kyis smras pa/ lnga gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams don du mi gnyer ro// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ gzhan nul bud med thams cad bskrun nA/ 
90a8(1): 'di gang la dga' bar gyur pa de chung mar blang bar bya'o// de nas gcig gis sbas pa/ lha gzhon nu ni sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan rnams bud med la bsrol du gsal la degang
90b1(1): mgrub bskyed par gyur bde btsun mor brang bar bgyi'o// num po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ de bzhin du gyis shig/ blon po rnams kyis rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rin po ches
90b2(1): sbas pa'i phung po spangs// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis khyim dang grong khyer phyag dar byi dor du bcug nas/ rgya skar dang tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dag bstan te
90b3(1): gdan la gshegs so seng ge'i khri ba shams pa la gzhon nu shAkya thub pa bzhag nas/ seng ge'i khri dang na bar rgyun sna tshogs kyi phung po spangs te/ blon po rnams dang
90b4(1): yang ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshigs gtso bor bkur ba rnams nang du zhug so// de nas bud med thams cad rang gi khyim gyi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i byang dang rgyan dang gos gyon
90b5(1): nas zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sngon phal dga' bas rgyan de dag de rnams la byin no// shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyi bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba gzugs
90b6(1): dang lang tshol bab pa chen de ma song nas/ shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyis sbas pa/ bum byang chub sems dpas rgyan sbyin gyis song shig/ des smras pa/ srab ci'o cag
90b7(1): pargyun ma mchis sam/ bu mo med pa ma yin mod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang bzhed pa de 'anga' bar mdzad do// yab 'dam yang rung ma 'dam yang
90b8(1): rung de kho na bdag gis sdum dab lags so// bu mo gal te de lta na shin tu 'gro dgos pas song shig/ de nas grags 'dzin ma na chod gzhon zhing cha lugs bzang ba/ skye
91a1(1): bo'i tshogs chen po'i yid dang mig 'phrog pa/ bud med thams cad kyi nang na lha'i bu mo bzhin du gzi brjid dang ldan pas nang du zhugs nas/ spyod lam dul bas// 
91a2(1): byang chub sems pa'i spyan sngar 'dag go/ byang chub sems dpas rgyan thams cad byin nas sor dum gyi rgya kho na lus pa byang chub sems dpas de la bstan pa dang / de nas thog
91a3(1): ma med pa'i dus nas mchog tu mnyes pa byas des/ seng ge'i khri'i skas la 'dzegs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyag nos ring gis phyung ngo // blon po rnams dang skyer skya'i
91a4(1): gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bo bkur ba rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ni bud med thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin to// 'dis gzhon nu'i thugs dang bstan
91a5(1): par nus pas 'di blang bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gsi grags 'dzin ma la bud med 'khor nyi khri dang gzhon nu shAkya thub pa'i btsun mor blangs so// chos nyid kyi
91a6(1): gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba skye bar gyur te/ de ni ma cig cing khru brgyar skye bar 'gyur la/ ji tsam ni ma
91a7(1): ma shar ba de srid du ni sen mos kyang bcad du rung la ni ma shar nas ni mtshon kyi kyang ma mchod cing mes kyang mi tshog pa zhig/ ser skya'i gzhi dang lhas bstan gyi bar na 'bab chu ro da ka zhes
91a8(1): bya ba'i 'gram na skyes te/ dus du su chu 'brug pas di'i rtsa ba brus na rlung gi shugs kyi 'gyel te/ 'gags bzhin du chu de 'dug go// de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis yul ni chu med
91b1(1): par me rung la/ zas gtsang gi yang chus ma rung ste/ rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring ba/ shing dge ba'i me tog 'gyel nas/ 'bab chu ro ha ka 'gagasu
91b2(1): 'gyur te mchis na/ gzhon mthu dang ldan pa zhes zos kyis de btang ba'i rigs so// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kho bo gzhon nu la bka' ma srol lo// 'dun pas smras pa/ lha bdag
91b3(1): la gnang ba 'ba' zhig stsol tsog dang / tsa nis kyang gzhon la yang bka' ma stsal bzhin du rang nyid gshegs par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis khas blangs so// 'dun
91b4(1): bas 'bab chu ro ha ka' 'gram du gzhon nu rnams kyis skyed mos tshal re re gtsugs nas smras pa/ gzhon nu dag skyed mos tshal du 'dod/ de rnams so'i shing rtar zhugs nas skyed mos
91b5(1): tshal du 'dod pa la/ lha sbyin gyi skyed mos tshal gyi steng nas dad pa zhig phur ba de/ lha sbyin gyi mdas snyan nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyed mos tshal du ltung ba dang / byang chub sems dpas bzung
91b6(1): nas mda' byung ste/ kun sman gyis klan nas soms so// lha sbyin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la spring ba/ dang po ni sngar ngas bzung ba yin gyis bskur cig/ byang chub sems dpas slar
91b7(1): spring ba/ ngas gang gi tshe kho na sems can thams cad phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de kho na'i byang che/ ngas sems can thams cad bzung ba yin
91b8(1): no// der byang chub sems dpa' dang lha sbyin lhan cig srid pa tha ma thog mar sha khon dbyung ste/ srid pa gzhan rnams ni phal me che zhig byung ngo // lags par rab sad kyis gzhon nu rnam
92a1(1): shing dge ba'i snying po byung ba'i phyir lcags so zhes zos nas/ des skye bo'i tshigs chen pos mngags ste/ de skye bo'i tshig chen po'i sgra chen po dang sna blon po brag nas/ byang
92a2(1): chub sems dpa' smras pa/ shes ldan dag skye bo'i tshigs chen po dang / skra mthon pa grag pa 'di ci zhig/ 'dun pas ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpas gsung
92a3(1): ba/ gal te de ldan 'byin du dong ngo // zhes byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu rnams dang lhan cig 'dod pa dang / dza tsam na khrang nas sprul gdug pa zhig byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du
92a4(1): byung ba dang / 2rlu ra kas byang chub sems dpa' thal bar bklags su 'gyur du'ong zhes mtshon rnon pas rlung du bcad ba las de'i dbugs kyis 'char ka la phog pas 'char ka nag pa
92a5(1): gyur nas/ de'i ming 'char ka nag po 'char ka nag po zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas gzhon rnams kyis shing dge ba'i snying po 'byin pa la/ lnga sbyin gyis 'bad pa dang / cung zad cig
92a6(1): g.yos so// dga' bos ni cung zad cig bteg go// byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad kyi thams cad du steng gi na mkha' la 'phags te/ dum bu gnyis su 'chag nas 'ab bya chu/ 
92a7(1): ro ha ka'i tshu rol kyi 'gram du dum bu gcig/ pha rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig lhung bar gyur to// byang chus sems dpas skye bo'i tshogs la gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag shing dge ba
92a8(1): snying po 'di ni bsil ba'i ring bzhin yin pas bris pa'i ning shri ba dang pol mgo byung ba la byugs na zhi bar 'gyur gyis dum bur byos la khyer cig/ gzhon nu rnams rang rang gi shing
92b1(1): ra zhugs te skyed mos tshal gyis nas ser skya'i gzhi mdong nas grong khyer du zhugs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' shing rtar zhugs pa la/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te 'di lo bdun
92b2(1): du rab tu ma byung bar gyur nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// shAkya dril bu sgra'i bu mos tshe ma zhes bya ba steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug lnga/ byang chub
92b3(1): sems dpas gzigs so// gzigs ma thig tu zhabs kyi ze bos shing rta mnan nas mi g.yo'i bar gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpas sa 'tshe ma la brtags par btsams so// byang
92b4(1): chub sems dpa' sa 'tsho ma la rtog pa na phyag na lcags kyi mda' bsnams pa de phyir blags so// sa 'tsho ma yang byang chub sems dpa' la rtog pa na rkang pa'i mthe bos// khang bzang
92b5(1): kyi gzhi brtol to// skye bo'i rin pos byang chub sems dpa' dang sa 'tshe ban tshun du rtog par byed cing lha'i bla sam pa skyes par gyur par mthong ngo // mthong nas smras pas/ bud med
92b6(1): 'di 'dra ba 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dang bstan par nus so// gtam te rgyal po zas gtsang gis zos nas/ des 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems pa'i btsun
92b7(1): mor blangs so// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe/ kha lo sgyur ba la kye kha lo sgyur ba re shig
92b8(1): gzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang der zhugs nA skyed mos tshol gyi gzhir 'gro'o// zhes gsungs par gyur pas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la bsgo
93a1(1): bkye kha lo sgyur ba re shig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / der bzhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha
93a2(1): lo sbyar ba/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas/ gzhon pa bzang mo myur du bshams te/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gan ba der song nas byin pa
93a3(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so// lha chibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyis/ lhang de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang
93a4(1): chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas/ skyed mos tshal kyi bzhir byung ba dang byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas ma rgas khogs gtugs/ sgur po phye ma
93a5(1): dgur po ltar kyang kyor can mdun nas khar ba la rten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba de'i skra sa pa ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur
93a6(1): ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo sbyar ba ma rgas khogs gtugs pa sgur po phyam dgur po ltar kyang kyor can mdun na 'khar ba la rten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro la de'i skra se ba ji ltar yang mi
93a7(1): gzhan pa dang ma 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ lha ma 'di ni rgan po zhes bya'o// kha lo sgyur ba rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha mi 'di ring po ma thogs pa kho nar gum par 'gyur bas/ de rgas pa
93a8(1): zhes bgyi'o// lo sgyur bar yang rgas pa'i chos dang rgas pa'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha yang rga ba'i chos can dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so// kha lo sgyur nas pa de'i
93b1(1): pI shing ra phyir ba sbyar cig/ pho brang nyid du dong ngo // 'di ltar nga po brang nyid du byin nas/ ngarga ba las ma 'das zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o// kha lo sgyur bas shing
93b2(1): phyir bsgyur nas pho zong nyid du chas te/ der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya zab pa pho brang gi nang du byon pa dang bang yang rgas pa las ma 'das pa lta zhig ches zhes mi dgyes shing zug
93b3(1): ngan dgongs so// 'dir smras pa/ dar yol rgas shing sgrar la mgo skya ga la gan 'khar ba thogs pa'i mi gzigs nas/ 'di bdag rgas las ma 'das zhes grag ces/ de nas
93b4(1): mi dgyes blugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba tsa gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas skyed mo sa tshal gyi bzhir
93b5(1): byung ngam/ skyed mos tshal mngon par dga' bla 'am/ lha ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs pa nA ma rgas 'khogs btugs
93b6(1): paM sgur po phyem dgur po lhur kyang kyor can ni sa 'khar ba la rten cing lus 'dar zhing mchil skra se ba ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so gzigs
93b7(1): nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kha lo sbyar ba mi rgas khegs gtugs pa sbrar phyag dam dgrar po ltar kyar kyor can mdun nas 'khar brten cing lus
93b8(1): 'dar zhing 'grol de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang ma 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ lha 'di ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o 'dis/ 
94a1(1): ngarag sungs te/ kha lo sgyur bzlas pa zhes bya ba 'dri ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol te/ lA ma 'ang ring po mthogs par kho nar gum par
94a2(1): 'gyur bas lha de ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'i de la 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba nga yang rga ba'i chos nyid la snga ma 'das snum/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol
94a3(1): to// lU yang rga ba'i chos dang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ de la 'di skad ces gsungs te kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir bsgyur cig/ pho zang nyid du 'dong ngo // 'di
94a4(1): ltar pho brang du phyin nas/ nga rga ba las ma 'das zhes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o// lha gzhon nu pho brang gi nang du gshegs te de na sang yang rga ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig/ 
94a5(1): ci mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan dang lhas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par
94a6(1): mi 'gyur grang / gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur mig bgos nas/ dad pas yang dag pa kho nas kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/ ma la/ 
94a7(1): bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga lam po che zhig byin la/ tsa nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o// snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis
94a8(1): byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan las lam po che zhig byin te ci nas kyang 'di la dgo'i zhing rab tu byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so// 'dir sbas pa/ rashAkya grub da
94b1(1): yab ni zas gtsang des// kha lo sgyur las tshig de zos nas ni// de che dga' nas bdag 'dir mi gzhug phyir// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las yang byin no// chos nyid kyis byang chub sems
94b2(1): dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par gzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/ kye lo sgyur ba re shig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / de la bzhon nas
94b3(1): skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kye kha lo sgyur ba re shig gzhon pa bzang po myur du shom
94b4(1): shig de la nga bzhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sbyong bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar nyan nas/ gzhon pa bzang
94b5(1): po bshams te/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na bar der song nas byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub la 'di skad ces gsol to// lnga chib ba bzang ba
94b6(1): bsham lags na/ lnga de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang po 'i zug nas skyed mo tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sem
94b7(1): dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skya bo rba ba rbab po rade pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyam pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis lha mi bod pa zhig zigaso// 'dul ba gzhi/ dum bu bzhi pa/ baM po brgyad bcu gsuM pa/ 
94b8(1): gzig nas kyang 'alo sbyar ba gsungs pa/ kha lo sbyar ba mi skya bo rba ba rbab po rod pa nyams chung ba dbang po nyams pa skye bo mang po'i mig gI lta pi bod pa 'di ci yin/ lha 'di ni zo thebs pa
95a1(1): / zhes bgyi'o// kha lo sbyar ba nad kyis thebs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha mi 'di gang gis gum par 'gyur ba'i gnas de mchis te/ lha 'di ni za thobs pa zhes 'gyi'o// 
95a2(1): kha' sbyong bar yang nad kyi chos dza nyid las ma 'das saman yang spyan dang spyan gyi chos kyi nang las ma 'ongs/ kha lo sbyar ba de'i byang shing na phyir snang cig blo zang zhid du 'dod / 
95a3(1): 'di lta ring po zang zhing du byin nas ngand las ma 'das zhes grag pa'i don de ni de bsam par bya'o// kha lo sbyor bas shing na phyir sbyar nas/ bzang zhing du chas ste/ der byang chub sems
