164a1(1): mthu che ba yin par shes na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyis kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang
164a2(1): ci ma rung snyam du sems pa yin nam/ nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyis sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo // 'o na ci'i slad du 'dir byon lags/ 'od srung khyod kyi mchod sbyin zhag bdun du
164a3(1): byas zin nas 'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan/ skye bo'i cho gas chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/ kye ma dge sbyong
164a4(1): chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de la yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go snyam sems pa ma yin nam/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar lags so// nga'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems shes nas de
164a5(1): 'ongs pa yin no// dge sbyong chen po ci bder kho na longs spyod du gsol/ de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan
164a6(1): che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags chang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'ong
164a7(1): srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po de'i slad du bdag gi nyen du bzhugs shig dang / bdag gis khyod la chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyor ro// 
164a8(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas lter rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rang kho nas g.yos byas nas bcom ldan
164b1(1): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gdugs 'tshod lags shing mchis na/ dge sbyong chen po de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ 
164b2(1): 'od srung de'i phyir song shig nga'ang 'ong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na/ shing
164b3(1): 'jam bu zhes bya ba gang gis/ 'jam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'jam bu'i sem rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi
164b4(1): bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byin nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so// de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'ongs
164b5(1): nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 
164b6(1): bod srungs 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon por mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag no/ shing 'jam bu we
164b7(1): bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhus/ 
164b8(1): kyis gal te longs spyod cig/ dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar 'tshal lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing
165a1(1): / mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// 'jam bu'i sde mji lta bur s+phu ru ra'i snyem rnams kyang de bzhin no// byang gi sgra mi snyan du gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab
165a2(1): pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'brus lhung bzed bkang ste bsnams nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ralnga pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od
165a3(1): srung ral pa can 'ongs nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pi can gyis bcom ldan 'das pasti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po byon tam/ 
165a4(1): 'od srung 'ongs so// dge sbyong chen po khyed kyi lhung zed na ci mchis/ 'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas/ 
165a5(1): ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'brus lhung bzed bkang nas/ 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par gyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig/ dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar 'tshal legs so// dems
165a6(1): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de bzhin du rgyal po bzhi dang / sum cu
165a7(1): rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su gshegs nas/ lha'i bdud rtsis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi rags chang tshi ngan bzhun rbad
165a8(1): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral btsun gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang nyid kyis g.yos byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong
165b1(1): rten pa gdugs tshad lag pa rnaMs mchis na dge sbyong chen pa de'i rdzas la bab par dgongs su gsaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das sangon pa'a' sham thabs bsdams/ lhung bzod dang chos gos bsnams
165b2(1): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can gyi bsti gnas gang ni bshams pa der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar
165b3(1): bzhugs par rig nas/ bcang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms zhes nas/ phyog
165b4(1): gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal byas kyi bya ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das chus chu ba'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i
165b5(1): dgos pa byung bar shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang / de nas bkod mchen po zhig byung ste/ chub ba de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu ba'i bya ba mdzad do// 
165b6(1): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bsgonas ma'i chag pan bkong mchen po byang se chu 'bab pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di sam du sems te chu 'di ni sngon ni med na chu 'dir lhar gang nas bab sam mo// 
165b7(1): de nas ltong rgyas 'od srung ral pa can/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag 'dir bsti
165b8(1): gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po'i cha ba cig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ chu 'di sngon ni ma mchis na da ltar chu 'di gnas bab snyam bgyid do// 'od srung 'dir khyod las ngas
166a1(1): bsod snyoms bzhes nas/ phyogs 'dir bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa na nga la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nga la chus chu'i dgos
166a2(1): pa byung bar shes nas phyogs 'dir lag pa sa la bsnun pa las/ de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ba de ngas chus chu'i bya ba mdzad de 'od srung rdzing 'di ni lag pas brkos pa zhes bya ba'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od
166a3(1): srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'an
166a4(1): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyed phyig nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na ba der gshegs
166a5(1): te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas rkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' cig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par bzhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung bar bzhed
166a6(1): pan/ shing ardzu na gang na ba der logs su phyag rgyang ngo // de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen por 'dud par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzung nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo // lteng rgyas
166a7(1): 'od srung ral pa can bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na ardzu na'i yul ga chen po 'dud pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ ardzu na'i yal ga 'di sngon
166a8(1): ni 'dud par ma gyur na/ ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di su zhig gis 'dud snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
166b1(1): gsom to// dge sbyong chen po mtshan par mdang du gsal// bdag 'di rang gnas na 'chas nganardzing lag pas banos pas naman/ mardzuna'i yal ga chen po 'dud ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag
166b2(1): 'di snyam du sems te/ a rdzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni 'dung bar mgyur na/ da 'di su zhig gis 'dud sum bgyid do// 'od srung da 'dir byin snyed nang du yang dag 'dzeg las bzhengs nas/ rdzing la gangs
166b3(1): brkos pas gan ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' cig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/ rdzing lag pas brkos par bzhugs te lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag pas
166b4(1): brkos pa nas byung bar 'dod nas shing a rdzun gang na ba der logs su lag ba brkyang ba dang / de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po 'di 'dung bar gyur te de yang 'jus nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas byung ngo // 
166b5(1): 'od srung 'di ni shing ardzu na'i lag pas bzung ba zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ ya mtshan cha
166b6(1): mod kyi/ bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags chang tshing na bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod
166b7(1): pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras gang tu bkru snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis bcom
166b8(1): ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas ri bragacig las rdol ba che la ring ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
167a1(1): / phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 'di la bkru bar gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te
167a2(1): nga'i phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams gang du bkram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che la ring ba zhig khyer
167a3(1): nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras rnams bkram du gsol/ de la bcom ldan 'das
167a4(1): kyis phyag dar khrod pa sha na'i ras dag bkram mo// lteng rgyas 'od srung ba sti gnas na 'chags pa na/ rdo leb che la ring ba dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag
167a5(1): sngon ni med na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dag da su zhig gis khyer te 'ongs so snyam mo// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
167a6(1): gsol to// dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ 'dir bdag bsti gnas na 'chag na rdo leb che la ring bdag cig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ rdo leb che la
167a7(1): ring ba 'di dag ni sngon ma mchis na rdo leb che la ring ba 'di dgad su zhig gis 'tshal te/ mchis snyam bgyid do// 'od srung 'dir ngas byug dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag brnyes so// de nas nga 'di snyam du
167a8(1): dgongs te phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dgang tu bkrus bsnam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig la rdo leb che la ring ba zhig blangs te/ 
167b1(1): phyin nas/ de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag ngarazod pa'i shana'i ras rnams bkru bar gsol/ ngas de la phyag dar khrong ba'i sha na'i ras rnams bkrus so// nga 'di snyam du
167b2(1): dgongs te/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa'i shana'i ras rnams gang tu bkram snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyis dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo leb che zhing ring ba gca
167b3(1): blangs te/ ngagangan pa der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrong pa'i shana'i ras rnams bkram du gsol/ ngas de la phrag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras
167b4(1): rnams bkram mo// 'od srung rdolab che zhing ring ba de dag ni gnod sbyin gyis blangs pa zhes bya'o// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu
167b5(1): ba yin te/ ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas nong lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags chang tshi ngan bzhugs so// de'i tshe ner wAn
167b6(1): chu cher 'brug nas bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag pas khebs pa'i steng nas kyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag par mdzad do// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral pa can 'di
167b7(1): snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po 'brug pas khyer bar ma gyur grang / ma la bdag gis dge sbyong chen po btsal lo// snyam du bsams nas/ shing cig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs
167b8(1): te bcom ldan 'das btsal ba ma lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang bas lhag par khebs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yog pa'i bla gab med pa na chag pas 'argyag pa
168a1(1): mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po gson nam 'od srung gson no// dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i
168a2(1): grur 'jug gi 'od srung 'jug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma langs ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na shing gcig pa'i glu ji lta bur chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu
168a3(1): 'phrul la mngon par 'du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na shing cig pa'i gru ji lta bar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad// 
168a4(1): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snya mo// de nas
168a5(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srung khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma
168a6(1): yin/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin te/ dgra bcom pa'i lam gang yin pa de yang mi shes so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam
168a7(1): du sems te/ dge sbyong chen pos go'u ma'i thugs kyis/ bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam tu rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag
168a8(1): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa
168b1(1): bgyi'o// 'od srung khyod kyis 'khor la bltas sam dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od srung de'i phyir re shig 'khor la ltos shig/ 'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa/ 
168b2(1): bshes gnyen can rnams kyis ni 'khor la bltas pa legs par yin no// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can rang gi bstinas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u rnam
168b3(1): la smras pa/ bram ze khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/ bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar/ tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/ shes ldan dag ci byed mkhan po bdag cag
168b4(1): gis cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni/ mkhan po brten nas/ lags pas gal te mkhan po dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan
168b5(1): po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo // bram ze'i khye'u dag khyod kyis de'i phyir g.yang bzhi dang shing shun dang 'khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs gzar 'di dag chu klung ni
168b6(1): rany+dza na'i nang du 'or cig/ mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang shing shun dang 'khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs dang / blugs zar rnams
168b7(1): chu klung nai rany+dza na'i nang du bor nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyi nas/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so// mkhan po 'di ltar bdag
168b8(1): cag gi bgyi ba gang lags pa bgyid lags so// de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
169a1(1): @#skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag gis 'khor la bltas te bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa
169a2(1): blta na bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyod par bgyi'o// 'od srung chur shog/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/ de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang dge slong
169a3(1): gi dngos por gyur to// de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi spun chu klung 'od srung dang g.ya 'od srung gnyis 'khor gnyis brgya lnga bcu dang chu klung nai rany+dza na'i mjug gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do// 
169a4(1): chu klung 'od srung dang ga ya 'od srung spun gyi g.yang bzhi dang shing shun dang 'khar ba dang ril ba spyi lugs dang blugs gzar de dag chu klung ner ny+dzan sa khyer ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems
169a5(1): te bdag cag gi tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po 'am rkun po 'am me 'am chus nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang / ma la bdag cag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams
169a6(1): btsal lo// snyam mo// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang ga ya 'od srung spun dag lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'chol zhing lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong ba dang / de'i tshe che dang
169a7(1): ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can sgra phyi snam sbyar bgos nas/ 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// chu klung 'od srung dang g.ya 'od srung spun gyis/ lteng rgyas
169a8(1): 'od srung ral pa can sgra phyi bsnam byar bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di skad ces smras so// 
169b1(1): 'o'o srung 'di mchog yin la/ de mchog ma yin nam/ 'od srung dag 'di ni mchog yin te/ de ni ma yin no// de nas chu klung 'od srung dang g.ya 'od srung spun dag 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma
169b2(1): yin pa yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa yin te/ gang gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas khogs gdugs pa ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis bkur sti
169b3(1): byas bla mar byas ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ shing dgra bcom par bkur ba de yang / lan gnyis kyi bar du yang dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu byung bar khas blangs kyis/ mal bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i
169b4(1): spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o// snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la/ rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par
169b5(1): rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// khyed kyis 'khor la bltas sam/ dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lags so// 'od srung dag
169b6(1): de ma ya sa du mas nam ca 'i ma ste nam pa ma bas pasesapa na/ na nuzlu byung sa pa nga smra ma tsham
169b7(1): gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/ kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par sbyang ba spyod na/ shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po dag bdag cag cung zad
169b8(1): ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po dag brten nas lags kyis/ gal te mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ngo // 
170a1(1): bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus yin par shes par gyis shig/ de nas chu klung 'od srung dang g.ya 'od srung spun 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu lnga bcu dang / bcom ldan 'das
170a2(1): gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/ dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par
170a3(1): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'thob par ldan bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// 
170a4(1): 'od srung chur shog/ tshangs par spyad par spyod cig de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang nges bya skyen par rdzogs pa dang / dge slong gi dngos por gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
170a5(1): kyis ral pa can stong po de rab tu byung ba snyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ lteng rgyas su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ ga ya gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs
170a6(1): pa nag yar byon nas ga ya na ga ya'i mgo'i mchod la sngon gyi ral pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de la/ 
170a7(1): cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rje su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul lo// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
170a8(1): ni 'di yin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na nyid kyi gdan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur cing / shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas
170b1(1): spyod lam rnam pa bzhis mdzad de/ 'di lta ste 'chag pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal bar mdzad do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin
170b2(1): la snyoms par zhugs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po dang / leb rgan dang
170b3(1): shel gyi kha dog dag go// tshe 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de/ sku'i slang nas me bar bar mdang la/ sku'i stong las chu grang mo'i rgyun 'debs par mdzad do// sku'i stong na mo 'bar bar mar
170b4(1): la/ sku'i slad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// 
170b5(1): phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dgung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ de la 'di ni bcom
170b6(1): ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag khyed kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o// khyed kyi yid ni 'di ltar bu'o// rnam par shes
170b7(1): pa ni 'di lta bu'o// 'di ni rtogs shig 'di ni ma rtogs shig/ 'di ni yid la byos shig/ 'di ni yid la ma byed cig/ 'di ni spongs shig/ 'di ni ma spangs shig/ 'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la
170b8(1): rdzogs par bgyis te mnos shig/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rje su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni 'di yin te/ dge slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun tu/ 
171a1(1): 'bar ba yin no// dge slong thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhe na/ dge slong dag mig dang // gzugs dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba
171a2(1): yin zhing mig gi reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin// dge slong dag rna ba dang
171a3(1): sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba
171a4(1): 'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/ 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no// gang gis kun tu 'bar zhe na 'dod chags kyi me dang zhe sdang gi me dang gti mug gi mes kun
171a5(1): tu 'bar/ skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa ste/ sdug bsngal gyis kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o// de la 'di ni
171a6(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam
171a7(1): par 'grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das ga ya na ga ya'i mgo bo mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ 
171a8(1): khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhug so// rgyal po gzugs can gyi
171b1(1): pa'i tsho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba dang /  'ams kyi gtsun du gang sa dbyings chu sa na 'i rgya snang bar bskye sa dang phy-i nigan byung bde blamaben can
171b2(1): mkhan dang lhas mkhan rnam gyis/ gal te khyim par gyur te/ khyim na gnas ni ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam pa rgyal ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan m+b+ha gyur
171b3(1): de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par gyur ro//  'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che
171b4(1): yin no// de la bu stong yang mtshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpa' brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'jom pa/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus b+ha/ 
171b5(1): bsngob med cing 'tsher med la 'di nyid chang ba med cir mtshon gyis 'da' nga med la/ chos dang mthun zhing sems par legs par ba bste gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur sbyin
171b6(1): bgos nas dad pas yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par
171b7(1): lung bstan to zhes thos so// thos nas kyang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// 
171b8(1): lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag cag 'dir lha'i yul rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzho nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'grem drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na byung ba de
172a1(1): bram ze mtshan mkhan dang bltas mkhan rnams kyis gal te khyim par gyur te khyim na gnas na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas/ 
172a2(1): bdun pa blon po rin po cher 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de la bu stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya
172a3(1): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig pa zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan pa zhig thos so// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
172a4(1): bzhin du'o// lha de khums shig/ lha bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o// grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhonu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i
172a5(1): bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ gal te khyim par 'gyur te/ gal te khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba nas/ chos dang
172a6(1): mthun zhing snyoms par legs par bab ste/ gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas
172a7(1): khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar de ltar khums shig/ lta bas pa
172a8(1): bas ches gtso bor 'gyur du mchi'o// zhes khyed cag de skad ma smra shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na grong bdag shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste gal te 'khor
172b1(1): lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na/ de'i g.yog bya'o// gal te spang pa ba spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med pa rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
172b2(1): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par gyur na/ de'i nyan thos su khas blang bar bya'o// de nas ma ga dA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po
172b3(1): steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhin 'dug nas/ smon pa'i gzhi lnga smon par byed pa/ kye ma bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
172b4(1): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa'i lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / 
172b5(1): de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang nye bar song ba dang / des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang / bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang / bdagi kyang chos bslabs pa de shes
172b6(1): nas bslab pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang dag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po
172b7(1): bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po de khang bzangs cher gyi gzhi la 'dug nas/ smon pa lnga smon par byed do// kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
172b8(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bco
173a1(1): ldan 'das 'byung ba dang / de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang / nye bar song ba na des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang / bdag gi
173a2(1): chos shes bslabs pa bcas shing bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung snya mo/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag cig ljongs rgyu ba na shAkya rnams kyi gzhon
173a3(1): nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i gti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin pa de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang bltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grab
173a4(1): par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho na khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med yang dag par rdzo Ta
173a5(1): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de g.ya na ga ya tra'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa bya ba byas pa/ byed pa
173a6(1): byas pa/ khur bor rab bdag gi don rjes su thob pa srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// zhes thos so// thos nas kyang / 
173a7(1): ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par ma dzad du gsol/ bdag cag
173a8(1): 'din lha'i yul na rgyu ba'o// shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa bde zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig
173b1(1): bgos nas dang pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas kyimamed par rab tu byung ba de blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de g.yan g.ya'i mgo' mchod rten la sngon tham
173b2(1): cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zang pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar dus
173b3(1): lha de la bkur sti mdzod cig dang / de lta na lha gtso bo bas ches gtso bor 'gyur ro// de nas ma ga d+hA rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs cani snying po'i mi zhig la spo ba kwa'e nang rje chur khyod bcom ldan 'das gang nab
173b4(1): der song song nas kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas la gnod pa chung ngam nyam nga ba nyung ngam 'tsho'am bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba dang sku nyams nga
173b5(1): ldan nam/ reg par spyod dam/ zhes nus la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang gzin
173b6(1): cha dang bsnun spyad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes gsol cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'chal zhes mi nges/ ma ga d+hA'i
173b7(1): rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go
173b8(1): phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mi nges 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mag d+ha'i gyeg po bzo sna thugs can snying pos phyag 'tshal nas/ gnod
174a1(1): pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ zhes bya ba nas reg par spyod pa zhes bya bar gong ma bzhin du/ bsnyun gsol lag so/ kye mi khyod dang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po
174a2(1): bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchid nas/ 'di skad ces bdag bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza'
174a3(1): chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gzims cha dang bstun spyad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol zhes mchi legs so// 
174a4(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te// 
174a5(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas
174a6(1): yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar sha stag dang thabs cig tu/ mug dA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yul ma gang+gA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab
174a7(1): gnas ltang brang gi tshal na yod pa gang na ba der gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnas su byon nas/ ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltar brang gi
174a8(1): tshal na bzhugs so// ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong gi dge bang 'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas sems
174b1(1): shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ma gad+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltung brang gi chal na yod pa gang na bder gshegs te/ ma ga d+hA
174b2(1): pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang brang gi tsha la na yod pa na bzhug so// thos nas kyang shing rta bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang rgyal po'i khab nas phyung nas/ bcom ldan
174b3(1): 'das la blta ba dang bsten bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan spun song bam de'i shing rta'i 'khor losa'i nang du 'bying bar gyur to// des bsams pa bdag gis las skyon can cung zad
174b4(1): byas par mgyur grang snyam mo// lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag btson ra na 'dug
174b5(1): gis de dag then cig/ rgyal pos spras pa gal te de lta na 'don no zhes rgyal pos brtson rnams 'din du bcug go// yang rgyal po'i phyir byung bar brtsams pa na dbu rgyan sgo la thug go des yang bsams pa/ 
174b6(1): bdag gis ni gdon mi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te/ des bdag la ltas ngan pa gzhan sgol dbu rgyun thug pa 'di byung ngo snyam mo// yang lha de rnams kyis yang smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod
174b7(1): kyis las skyon can ma byas mod kyi khyod dang lhan cig mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kha cig ni 'dus/ kha cig ni yul ljongs gzhan ga ge mo zhes bya ba dag na las kyi mtha' byed cing
174b8(1): 'dug pa de dag sbron cig/ rgyal pos yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bkugo// de nas po gzugs can snying po shing rta khri nyis stong dang zhabs 'bring ba rta ba'i tshogs khri brgya stong dang / 
175a1(1): ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
175a2(1): song ngo // de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste bzhon pa las babs rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhug so// ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos thag ji tsam nas/ bcom
175a3(1): bcom ldan 'das mngon pa'i bar de nas/ rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po ze'u ka dang gdugs dang ral gri dang nor bu'i rnga yab dang / lham khra bo rnams phud do// / 'dul ba gzhi/ dum bu bzhi pa/ 
175a4(1): bam po brgyad cu dgu pa/ de ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po'i bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bla gos
175a5(1): phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de rang gi ming nas phyung ste lan gsum gsol ba/ btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
175a6(1): gzugs can snying po lags so// btsun pa bdag ni ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po logs so// rgyal po legs so rgyal po de bzhin te de de bzhin no// rgyal po chen po
175a7(1): khyod ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no// rgyal po yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod rang gi stan ci lta ba 'dug shig/ de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
175a8(1): can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// mag ng+gA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis
175b1(1): mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ 
175b2(1): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'khod do// kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong nas cang mi slu bar phyogs cig tu
175b3(1): khod do// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dge sbyong chen po ldeng rgyas 'od
175b4(1): srung ril pa can gyi tshangs par spyad pa la spyod dam/ 'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral bcan dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa la spyod snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim
175b5(1): bdag rnams kyis sems mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung la tshig su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba smras pa/ lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dir ci mthong na/ me spangs nas ni brtul zhugs
175b6(1): 'di dge spyod/ khyod kyis ji ltar me'i mchod spangs pas/ don de 'od srung nga la smra bar gyis/ lteng rgyas 'od srung gis gsol pa// 'di na kha cig zas skom de bzhin no// 'dod pa dag dang bud med
175b7(1): kho na smra// de dag thabs kyi dri ma rab mthong ste// des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsregs lugs min// khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang // de bzhin ro la yid ni mi dga' na// lha min 'jig rten
176a1(1): / des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' ba sreg zugs min// ga 'bang mi nyams mchob ni mnathong bas// mchod sbyin nu la zhugs dang mi nugs dag gis// 'gro sam bdag gi yid ni rmongs gyur te/ 
176a2(1): dmus long gyur nas skye shi rjes bzhin mthom// skyob pa gtso bo mchog gis legs bshad pa// go 'phang 'dus byas de bzod mthong na// thub pa go'u ta ma rnam par 'dren khyod ni// skye bo ba la cher den brtson brje
176a3(1): la zhugs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis rtogs pa legs rtogs te// khyed kyis nyes par bsams pa yin// rab tu phyi ba'i chos rnams la// gtso bo gang yin de blangs so// 'od srung 'gro
176a4(1): bcas skyo bskyed cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung la// bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag ni rang gi stan gyi nang na mi snang bar gyur cing / shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar
176a5(1): snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de// 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba byed de/ me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed de/ me'i ting
176a6(1): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gi lus las 'od gzer rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang / le ba rgan dang zhes
176a7(1): gyi kha dag pa/ cho 'phrul drung du yang ston par byed de lus kyis spang nas me 'bar bar byed la lus kyi stong nas chu grang me'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do// lus kyi sgod nas me 'bar bar byed la lus kyi spang nas chu drang ma'i
176a8(1): rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// shar phyogs la ji ltar ba bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstanas/ 
176b1(1): rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdus te/ bla gos phrag bcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i ljangs bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gan ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung na/ bcom ldan 'a
176b2(1): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags so// bdag ni bcom
176b3(1): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags so// 'od srung de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'od srung nga ni khyed kyi ston pa yin// khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no// 'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no// khyod nga'i nyan thos yin no// 
176b4(1): 'od srung khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gis bcom ldan ldadas kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram
176b5(1): ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong chen po ni lter rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la mi spyod kyi/ lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nyid dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyad pa la
176b6(1): spyod do snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gzugs la skye ba yang yod/ 'jig pa yang yod/ de'i skye ba dang 'jig
176b7(1): pa yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la skye ba dang / 'jig pa yang yod de/ de'i skye ba dang 'jig par yang rig par bya'o// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi
176b8(1): bus gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas/ gzugs de yongs su shes so// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i chos
178a1(1): nyid rig nas/ rnam par shes pa de yongs su shes so// rgyal po chen po'i rigs kyi bus gzugs yongs su shes na/ gzugs la bdag gam bdag gi khas mi len mi 'dzin// 
178a2(1): lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang yongs su shes bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/ 
178a3(1): mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas/ mngon par zhen par mi byed do// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bu gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas mngon par zhen par mi byed na/ 
178a4(1): tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smra'o// rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/ 
178a5(1): mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas mngon par zhen par mi byed na/ tshad med cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes smras so// des ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems
178a6(1): te/ gal te gzugs bdag ma yin/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin na/ 'o na bdag gam sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po'am gso ba po 'am/ gang
178a7(1): zug gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu'am/ byed du 'jug pa po 'am/ shes pa po 'am/ kun nas shes pa po 'am/ spong ba po 'am/ kun nas spong ba po 'am/ smra ba po'am tshor ba po 'am/ 
178a8(1): kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa nam yang ma byung ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing da ltar yang yod pa ma yin na gang gis de dang der dge ba dang sdig pa'i las byas rnams kyis rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su
178b1(1): myong zhing gang gis drang po 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+hA'i bram ze nga khyim bdag rnams kyi sems
178b2(1): mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag bdag bdag ces bya ba'i ni byis pa sos skye bo thos ba ldan dra'i brtags pa'i rjesu lhung ba yin te/ 'di lta ste bdag ce'am bdag
178b3(1): gi med kyi/ dge slong dag skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skye ning 'gag pa na yang sdug bsngal 'gag go// skye ba na yang 'du byed rnams skye cing 'gag pa na 'du byed rnams 'gag par gyur te/ rgyu de yang rkyen de la
178b4(1): brten nas sems can rnams kyis 'du byed kyi rgyud 'jug go// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi rgyud nyid mtshams sbyor ba thugs su chung nas sems can gyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba 'don
178b5(1): par mdzad de/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag par mi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa dang dman pa dang / gya nom phrang
178b6(1): bde 'gro dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang gzigs so// las ji lta ba bzhin nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par
178b7(1): spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa ldan 'phags pa rnams la bskur ba 'debs pa dang log par lta ba yin te/ log par lta ba'i las dang / chos blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen
178b8(1): des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa dag dang yid kyi/ 
179a1(1): legs par spyod pa dang ldan 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang yang dag par lta ba yin te/ yang dag par lta ba'i las dang chos blangs pa'i rgyus/ rgyu de dang rkyen des
179a2(1): lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar mkhyen to dge slong dag ngas de ltar mkhyen cing de ltar gzigs pas nga 'di skad ces bdag gam sems can
179a3(1): nam srog gam skye ba po 'am/ gso ba po 'am gang zag gam/ shed skyes sam shed bu 'am byed pa po 'am byed du 'jug pa po 'am/ shes pa po'am kun nas shes pa po 'am slong ba po 'am kun nas slong ba
179a4(1): zo 'am sgrub po'am tshor ba po 'am/ kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa ni nam yang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / da ltar yang yod pa yin pas gang khris de dang dge ba dang sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams
179a5(1): kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong zhing gang gis phung po khor te/ phung po gzhan dang nying 'tshams sbyor ba de chos su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa 'di yin no zhes mi gsung ngo // de la brdar
179a6(1): btags pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste 'di yod pas 'di yod/ 'di skyes pas 'di skye ste/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rkyen
179a7(1): gyis gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshu ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i
179a8(1): rkyen gyis sring ba/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis kye ba skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga gi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar na sdug bcwa
179b1(1): gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste 'di med pas 'di med pa de/ 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gal
179b2(1): pasaHrnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gag pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gag pas skye mched drug/ skye mched drug 'gag pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gag pas tshor ba
179b3(1): 'gug/ tshor ba 'gag pas sred pa 'gag/ sred nga 'gag pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gag pas srid pa 'gag srid pa 'gag pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gag pas rba shi 'gag// rga shing nga mya ngan dang sna
179b4(1): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' nog pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'du byed rnams ni sdug
179b5(1): bsngal lo// mya ngan 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// rgyu kun 'byung bas sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gags pas sdug bsngal 'gag pa ste/ rgyu bcad pas mi byung zhing nying mtshams sbyor ba med pas 'gags pa'i di
179b6(1): nyid ni sdug bsngal yin no// dge slong dag de la yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gzhin med kyi sdug bsngal 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi bar/ de ni gsel bar gyur pa/ de ni nub pa ste/ dge slong
179b7(1): dag zhi ba'i gnas ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste phung po thams cad spangs pa/ sred pa zad pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'gags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ma ga d+hA'i
179b8(1): rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying mo la lan gnyis su bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gzugs rtag gam mi rtag/ btsun pa mi rtag lags so// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal
180a1(1): yin ma sdug bsngal ba ma yin/ btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so// mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni
180a2(1): bdag yin// bdag ni 'di yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag gi zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rtag
180a3(1): ba ma mi rtag/ btsun pa 'di ni rtag lags so// mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam sdug bsngal ma yin/ btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lags so// mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i chos can gang
180a4(1): yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa/ 'di ni bdag yin no// 'di ni bdag ni 'di yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/ btsun pa ma lags so// 
180a5(1): rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung ba 'das pa 'amam 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am phyi'am/ rags pa'am phra ba'am/ ngan pa'am gya nom pa'am/ gang dag thag ring
180a6(1): ba 'am/ gang dag thag nye ba yang rung ste/ de thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no// bdag ni 'di ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gi bdag yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar
180a7(1): bya'o// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed gang ci yang rung ba dang rnam par shes pa gang ci yang rung ba 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ nang gi 'am phyi'i 'am/ 
180a8(1): rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ gya nom pa 'am/ gang dag thag ring ba'am/ gang dag thag nye ba yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la 'di ni bdag ma yin no// bdag ni 'di ma yin no// 'di ni bdag gi
180b1(1): bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag 'i shes rab kyis dri lbu ba bzhin du bas byu bya'o// rgyal byachen po 'phags pa'i rjes thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar mthong ba ni/ gzugs la ying 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
180b2(1): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro yod 'byung na 'dod chags dang bral ba'o// 'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol na/ bdag
180b3(1): gi skye ba zad do// tshangs par sten to// bya ba byas so// srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
180b4(1): gzugs can snying po dang lha brgyad khri dang ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma la chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs
180b5(1): can snying pos chos mthong ba dang chos thob pa dad kyi rig pa dang chos gting sgribs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhon gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / 
180b6(1): ston pas bstan pas chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das
180b7(1): la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen
180b8(1): du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang baspod// skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong dge 'dun da
181a1(1): bcas pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar dun bza' chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gzims cha dang bsnyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid lags ni bcom ldan 'das
181a2(1): rgyal po'i kha Ta ba tu gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas ma gra d+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs
181a3(1): can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // dge slong rnams la
181a4(1): the chom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo spangs gzugs can snying po 'khor dad bcas pas las ci zhig bgyis na/ 
181a5(1): / las de rnam par smin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas
181a6(1): pa las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing brtsegs pa ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang
181a7(1): bcas pas las byas shing brtsegs pa dag gzhan su zhig gi so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing brtsegs pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la
181a8(1): mi 'gyur me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing brtsegs pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams la smin par 'gyur te/ 
181b1(1): las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni// chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu gyur pa nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa na 'jig rten na ston pa/ 
181b2(1): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtsibs kyi lte ba
181b3(1): zhes bya ba byung nas/ des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad de/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de'i sku
181b4(1): gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas na sa sa phyogs dben zhing yangs pa zhig tu mchod rten brtsigs so// de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba khrom gyi ru ba bye phrag bco brgyad dang steng gi
181b5(1): nam mkha' las rgyu ba nas mchod rten de dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i 'khor lo rin po che thogs par byas so// rgyal po kri kris bsams pa 'di ltar
181b6(1): 'khor lo rin po che 'di thogs pa las na/ bdag gis bsod nams zad par ma gyur grang snyam mo// de la lha rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyi bsod nams ma zang mod kyi phyogs 'di man/ 
181b7(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtsibs kyi lte ba'i mchod rten bzhugs pa des na 'khor lo rin po che/ 'di de'i steng du mi 'gro zhing thogs par gyur to// de nas rgyal po sa kri khrom gyi rung
181b8(1): bye ba phrag kyi bco brgyad dang lhan cig bcas na ci tsam na mchod rten byi dar ma byas pa de mthong nas/ 'khor dang bcas pa des byi dor byas te/ dri dang byug pa dang bdug pa dang bye ma dang rol mo rnams
182a1(1): kyis mchod pa byas nas 'khor dang bcas pas drung du bzhud de smon lam btab pa bdag gi yon nas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bdag gis yon tan 'di
182a2(1): lta bu dag thob par 'gyur ba dang / ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed cing mi mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces btab bo// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po kri kri
182a3(1): zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di nyid yin te/ 'khor dang bcas pa des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtsigs kyi lte ba'i mchod
182a4(1): rten la mchod pa gang yin pa de'i las rnam par smin pas/ 'dis bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag mang por lha dang mi rnams mde ba khyad par du 'phags pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur to// 'di lta bu'i yon tan
182a5(1): dag thob par gyur ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni nga'i spyan sngar 'khor dang bcas pas bden par mthong bar byas so// ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed cing mi mnyes par ma gyur cig ces smon lam
182a6(1): btab pa gang yin pas ni dge slong dgang nyid dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte bar lhan cig mnyam pas mnyam ste/ stobs mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / brtson 'grus
182a7(1): mnyam pa dang / thob pa mnyam pa yin te/ 'dis ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyi mi mnyes par byas pa ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyis rnam par smin pa ni gcig
182a8(1): tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni dkar ba yin/ 'dren pa rnams kyi ni 'dren ma ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang / 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la
182b1(1): las gcig sung gar b.las brtsal bar byaste/ dge slong dag zed kyis ma bras thang ba rtsam/ dam tha mas patsam rgyas nas mtsham thams cad bzang ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun
182b2(1): bzedang ldan pa snyeng rgyas 'od srung gis las ci zhig bgyis ma/ des mtsha' phrul lnga brgyas 'dul bar 'gyur lags/ chu krung 'ang slang dang ga yabong srung dag ni tshigs chu dus 'dul bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan
182b3(1): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur gyur/ zhes bya ba'i bar du gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon
182b4(1): 'byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la/ skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ 'jig rten du snyan po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gces
182b5(1): ba 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba byed nas/ de wA ra NA si'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu brten te/ drang srong sgra
182b6(1): ba'i ri dgas kyi nags su bzhugs so// des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'o// 
182b7(1): de'i sku gdung rgyal po kri kris spos kyi shing thams cad spangs te/ spungs nas bsregs nas me 'o mas bsad de/ sku gdung de dag rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du blugs nas sa phyogs dben zhing yangs
182b8(1): par sku gdung gi mchod rten dbang du dpag tshad gcig la/ rgyar dpag tshad byed pa zhig brtsigs so// de'i tshe wA ra NA si na khyim bdag phyug po nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ 
183a1(1): rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor la 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig brtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ 
183a2(1): de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na/ rim gyis khye'u gsum bcas so// ji tsam na khyim bdag de nad kyis thebs/ rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang / lo ma dang 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu'i sman rnam
183a3(1): kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur nas/ de 'chi bar chos dang ldan par gyur to// de nas de'i bu rnams kyis ras sngon po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar pos phyogs brgyan nas dur khrod du
183a4(1): khyer te bsregs so// de nas phal pha'i bya ba byas te mya ngan bsangs te/ nor so sor bgo bar bgros byas par brtsams nas/ phung po shos kyis smras pa/ nor bgo'o// nu bo spun la gnyis ma dang ngo // 
183a5(1): des gal gyis bcus pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa gal te de ltar na re shig 'jig rten gyi pha rol gyi lam rgyags blangs la phyis bgo bar bya'o// des smras pa ci dag bya/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ yang dag
183a6(1): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di la mchod ngo do// de dang pachung ba zhig pas des bka' khor du las blangs so// de nas de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la mchod nas smon lam btam
183a7(1): bar brtsams te/ gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bram zhes bya ba la bram
183a8(1): the'i khre'u khrong skyo dgu rnams kyi che lo brgya thub pam de bzhin gshegs pa dgra com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shakya thub pa zhes bya bar gyur to zhes lung bstan par gang yin pa de'i bku / 
183b1(1): sa ran ga cag rab byung nas/ zang par thob par gyur byeg ces smon sam pa po/ lnga'is kyi ston sa btabang/ phrub dis tho na chung du du sron la btab par brtsams pa/ bdag ni dang bachung zhing ngadu rgod kyi
183b2(1): thas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thu rjes cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul nas rab tu byung ste/ rab tu byung nas khyang par rtog pa gyur cig ces bya'o// dge slong dag jis ma du sems/ mu za nas
183b3(1): da rgod dang pa chung pa gang yin pa de ni lteng rgyas 'od srung 'di nyid yin no// nu bo gnyis po gang yin pa de ni chu klung dang g.ya 'od srung 'di dag nyid yin no// smon lam gyi dbang des na lteng rgyas 'od srung cho 'phrul lteng rgyas
183b4(1): dbul ba'i mo// chu klung 'od srung dngag la 'od srung ni tshigs chungs btul ba yin no// gang gi che rgyal po gzugs can snying pa gzhon nur gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal de'i khab ma khyim padagacig yod pa de la/ kun dga'
183b5(1): ba'i me tog dang / bzas bu dang / phun sumatshogs pa zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags pa gyur to// si tsam na gzugs car snying po phyi ra la du byung bas skyed mos chal de mthong ba dang / de yang lhag par chags par gyur
183b6(1): nas smras pa khyim bdag skyed mos chal 'di la byin cig/ des ma byin no// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang smras pa ma yang mabyin nas yang smras pa/ rin sbyin no// des smras pa gcon nu gnyis na kho bo yul na su
183b7(1): spyugs kyang bla'i/ skyed mos chal 'di mi 'bu'o// gzhon nu gzugs can snying pos smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis sman pa dran par byos shig/ nam nga rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe/ nga nyid kyis bkur ro// des
183b8(1): spras pa/ nam khyod rgyal por gyur pa de'i che kho bo yang rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o/ gnon nu gzugs can snying pos mjal to zhes byas nas song ngo // ji tsa mdus gzhan zhig na rgyal po pad+ma mchen po shi nas/ 
184a1(1): bzhon du gzugs can sring po rgyal sringal banag pa dang / des sbed mos chal de mthus phrogs so// khyim bdag de meng na cing skyed mos chal de la lhag par chags pas/  shinas
184a2(1): de nyid kyi sbrul gdug pa zhig tu skyes so// de rgyal po la rgyun tu glags tshol ba la lhur len cing gnas so/ ji tsam na rgyal po gzugs can snying po gso ga'i dus la bab ste/ me tog gi shing rnams kha 'dus
184a3(1): ban/ btsun mo dang lhan cig skyed mos chal der zhugs nas/ de den skyes pa med par rol mos btsun me'i bud med dang lhan cig dga' ba'i rtsed mos nyams su myong bar byas nas gnyid ldog na
184a4(1): bud med ni me tog dang 'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas/ kun tu khyam du dong ngo // bud med cig cig ral gri bskur te rgyal po bsrung du bcug go// de nas sbrul gdug pa des rgyal po'i drung na/ sgra mi grag
184a5(1): par rig nas rgyal po la gzung ba'i/ chang nas byung ste chas so// rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi mthus bya ka lan+da ka zhes bya ba de rnams kyis sbrul gdug pa de kun nas bskor nas/ ci ci'i sgra phyung ngo // 
184a6(1): bud med ral gri thogs pas thos nas/ sngangs te sgra chen po byung nas/ ral gris gsad do// de nas rgyal po yang spangs te sangs nas smras pa/ 'di ci byung / bud med des smras pa/ lha sbrul gdug
184a7(1): 'di lha la brdung bar chas na/ bya ka lan+da ka rnams kyis ci tso sgra phyung bas/ bdag gis bkum lags so// rgyal po'i gnas skabs de gzhon nu dang blon po dang / khrom gyi rub dang / rgyal po'i khab na/ 
184a8(1): gnas pa'i skye blo'i chogs rnams kyis zis nas/ sred mos chal de'i phyir nang dugu ci'i sgachen pos gang bar gyur te/ rgyal po de'i skye dgu la bums pa nigangs/ khrir zhing bdu ma'i gyu ba'i tsha
184b1(1): dang bcas te mig mchi mas gang zhing 'khod do// de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan ngas rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la srog slob pa de la mchog ci zhig sbyin/ skye ba'i tshogs kyis
184b2(1): smras pa lnga rgyal srid dbyed do// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag byai ka lan+da ka rnams kyis nga'i phrag byin pas rgyal srid byed 'di dag la byin no// blon po rnams kyis spras paM/ swa bya 'di dag ni du
184b3(1): 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba lags pas/ rgyal srid kyi phyed 'di dag la ci bgyi/ 'di dag 'od ma'i chal gang du gnas pa der 'di dag gi gnas bca'o// rgyal pos spras pa de bzhin du bgyis shig/ 
184b4(1): bskyed mos tshal de 'od ma'i tshal gyis yongs su bskor te/ blon po rnams kyis de rnams kyis gnas 'od ma'i tshal gyi nyen 'khor du bcas pas/ de 'od ma'i chal bya ka lan+da ka gnas zhes bya bar gyur te/ 
184b5(1): rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zhing ba kun tu 'tsho rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung nas/ des bskyed mos chal de de'i gnas kyi phyir byin no// ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs/ 
184b6(1): pa dang / rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas ning zhig gi drung na bzhugs so// ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu ning gshegs pa nas/ 
184b7(1): rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/ shing zhig gi drung du bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal ba'i mthu chen pos rgyal hU~M b+h+rUM khab nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das
184b8(1): gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mag
185a1(1): @d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis/ yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ 
185a2(1): rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzus
185a3(1): can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo // de nas me ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo
185a4(1): sbyangs gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nang par sngar langs te/ gdan bshams pa la nor bu chu snod bzhag nas/ bcom ldan
185a5(1): 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod lags na/ nga de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' sham thabs bsnams lhung
185a6(1): brjed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun du bdar te/ ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i bkangs gang mdor
185a7(1): gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas ma gad+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos sangs rgyas la sogs pas dgra
185a8(1): slong gi dge 'dun bde bar gshegs par rig nas/ gcang zhing bsod pa'i gza' ba dang bca' bdag rang gi lag nas/ stobs shing 'chim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsor gyi
185b1(1): pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing 'chim par byed te/ bcom ldan 'das gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/ lhung bzed bkru bar rig nas/ gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ btsun pa
185b2(1): 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la nA ka gnas pa 'di/ bcom ldan 'das ci bde bar bzhugs shig ces bcom ldan 'das la bskyed mos chal de phul lo// de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde rnam
185b3(1): kyi nang du/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i chal bya ka la nA ka gnas pa na bzhugs so zhes gdegs par byas so// // / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la nA ka'i
185b4(1): gnas pa na bzhugs so// rgyal po'i khab ma khyim bdag cig gnas pa des/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rang gi khyim du spyan drangs so// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis
185b5(1): dge slong ko'u ta ma ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi cha la mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhug so// shes ldam go'u ma
185b6(1): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che'o zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig ma
185b7(1): yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das
185b8(1): la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye go'u ta me bdag gis shes ldan go'u ta ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis che'o zhes thos lags na lo'u ta ma
186a1(1): gang dag de skad ces lung ston pa de dag de skad ces lung ston pa de dag gcig dge sbyong go'u ta ma la bskur pa 'debs pa lags sam/ thal bar smra ba ma lags sam/ shes ldan go'u ta ma
186a2(1): gsungs pa bzhin smra ba lags sam/ chos smra ba lags sam/ chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sam/ cig de dag gi drung du pha rol pa'i chos dang mthun pa'i brtsod pa'i rjes su brtsod pa mchis
186a3(1): na smon pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur lags sam/ rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad du smra ba de dag ni de skad du lung ston pa bden te nga la skur pa 'debs pa ma yin/ thal bar smra ba ma yin/ de ni gsungs pa bzhin
186a4(1): smra ba yin/ chos dang mthun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te/ de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang mthun pa'i brtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa 'ongs na/ smon pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
186a5(1): ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// shes ldan dag go'u ma de skad gsungs mod kyi/ shes ldan dag go'u ta ma la bdage yid mi ches la gros so// de ci'i slad du
186a6(1): zhe na/ kye go'u ta ma re shig rgan zhing rgan pa'i dge slong dang bram ze ni 'di dag lags te/ 'di lta ste 'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyuganag lhas kyi bu dang / spu 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal can dang / mi pham
186a7(1): sgra'i la ba can dang / ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu gnyen gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang / da dung bla na med pa yang dag bla rdzog pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs pas sangs rgyas pa bdag nyid g.yar gyis mi ches lags na/ 
186a8(1): shes ldan go'u ta ma 'khrungs nas ring por ma lags bla gra sar du rab tu byung bas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu bzhi po 'di dag la khyad par du gsang pa mi bya/ gzhon la zil gyis mnan pA mi bya ste/ 
186b1(1): bkyib rkyen rgya la rgya rigs gco mu la kyang dugs dpar me gyu rgyan tshus dri la tham mi rgya'o// chum bcan po sprul ban kyang dugs pa min+da ba sa kyis ma nang mchun/ tshul bam
186b2(1): me rlung ngu la khyang du gsang bla mi bya / chung la khril gyis gnan du mi bya'o/ rgyal po chen thodage slong gnin nul byang drug sang pa mi gan nu zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o// ji ci'i phyir chen/ dge slong gzhon nur gyur kyang / 
186b3(1): de la rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i dgra bcom pa gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa nas ni bde gshegs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs/ 
186b4(1): rgyal rigs dpe byang ldan pa dang / rigs bcu na grags par ldan pa yi// blo dang ldan pas de bzhin zhes// khyad du migs de mi gnam// rgyal po rgyal rigs / mkhas pa yis// rgyal sring dag ni thob gyur nas
186b5(1): chad pas gcod pa'i gnas de yod// de bas del shin tu gtud// de ltar rang gi srog srung zhing // rang gi don la blta bas ni// dom khyang du migasad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// gal te grong ngamangs
186b6(1): pa'ang rung // gang du sbrul ni mthong gyur na// blo dang ldan pas den rgyags// khyang du mi gsad zil gyi minan// 'di ltar sbrul ni rgyu ba ma// rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs la/ 5/ glags rnyed nas glaman nus kyi
186b7(1): skyes pa bud med du ma zin// de ltas rang gi srog srung zhing // rang gi don la blta bas ni// de ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// mang po bsregs cing 'bar byed pa// mang po bsregs
186b8(1): shing za ba'i me// blo dang ldan pas de chung zhes// khyad du mi gsad zil mi nan// me ni chu ngur gyur pa yang // rkyen la chen por gyur pa yin// mes ni ring por mi thogs par// grong rdal dang ni grong khyer bsreg/ de ltas rang gi
187a1(1): gi srog srung zhing // rang gi don la blta bas ni// des ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de bas legs pa bag kyang bya// nags tshal bsregs pa gang yin te/ zhag 'das nas ni 'ga' zhig tu/ 
187a2(1): 'dab ma rnams ni skye 'gyur gyi// dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa la// brten nas gang zhig tshig gyur pas// de la bu cha yong min pas// bgro sbyong ba thob mi 'gyur// ta la'i mgo ni bcad pa bzhin// ring por
187a3(1): mi thogs rabs kyang chad// de bas rang gi srog bsrung zhing // rang gi don la blta bas ni// de ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang // de bzhin
187a4(1): brang gro ma dang ni// dge slong tshul khrims ldan de la// blo dang ldan pas brnyas mi bya// de bas rang gi srog srung zhing // rang gi don la blta bas ni// de ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de la legs par bag kyang
187a5(1): bya// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyisu gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
187a6(1): kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ rgyal po zas gtsang la
187a7(1): spring mig bskur ba// wa dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ khyed kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba 'chim par byed de zhes spring ba/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas/ ba nya btang bas ji rje
187a8(1): nyid du rab tu byung ngo // gnyis pa btang ba las de yang de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to//

187b2(1): pe dang / 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du khyed phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe
187b3(1): kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las/ de dag gi kho bo'i gan du 'ongs nas/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dis bzhug so// zhes smra'o// da ni kho bos phrin yig skyel ba'i
187b4(1): mi btang na 'ga' yang 'phrin yig khyer te ma 'ong na ji ltar sems khongasu mi 'gyur/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag mchi ste bka' mchid 'tshal la slar mchi'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/

187b6(1): zas gtsang gis rang nyid kyis spring yig bris pa/ lhums su zhugs pa bzung nas su/ khyod kyi bdag gis cher bskrun te// nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du// rgyal ba ljon shing la bsda ma/ 
187b7(1): ngami khyod kyi slob ma yi// yal ga lpag ma 'phel 'gyur pas// gzhan nA de bas dga' dra 'byar/ bdag ni sdug bsngal myong bar ldan// gnam sang gang gis sbyis na// ljon shing lcag rngam mtshungs rgyamam/

188b7(1): bcom ldan 'das las nyan nas/ 'char ka rab tu byung bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i chos dgo de la rgyas par smras nas/ 'char ka 'di ni khyod kyis bya ba yin te/ deng phan chad
188b8(1): bud med dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal bar mi bya'o// zhes bya ba dag go// btsun pa bka' bzhin chal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song nas/ 
189a1(1): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
