189a3(1): gal te nang du spyon cig ces gleng na 'jug go// zhugs te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan yang yod dam/ zhes zer na yod do zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha bya
189a4(1): 'di 'dra'o zhes 'drin/ 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhe brjod pa bya'o// khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab du yang gnas pa mi bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don tham cang grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par byed ngam zhes
189a5(1): gleng na/ mi zhugaso zhes brjod pa bya'o// gal te gang du gnas bla byed ces 'drin dgon pa'am/ gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'drin/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
189a6(1): rnam par bris te bstan par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'drin byon no zhes brjod par bya'o// gal ta gzhan na ji srid cig na byon zhes 'dri na/ zhag bdun lon na'o zhes brjod
189a7(1): pra bya'o// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchil gso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa song shig/ sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis te/ lha rnam bsams pa grub 'gyur zhing / de bzhin bsam
189a8(1): gtan pa rnams kyi/ sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir son pa de ltar byin gyis brlab pa dang / 
189b1(1): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dang pa mi brubang ba skyes pa'i rgyal ba'i khab kyi slor bsdud nas/ smras pashes ldan dag rgyal pol babru'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsal cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ jig pa'i das
189b2(1): grong gcan dag kyang yod des shes lda dag mad // de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ byang dge slong marnaMs so// rgyal ba'i smras pa nang dutho cog/ de nang du zhugs pargyal pobs gcang gis mthong nas smras pa 'ar
189b3(1): ka rab tu byung ngam/ des smras pa lnga rab tu byung ngo // khyod slar 'ong ngo nas smras pa ma yin nam/ 'di ci yin 'char kas smras pa lnga bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi phonya 'di lta ma yin no zhes bka' stsal na/ chos 'dul ba
189b4(1): legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung med kyi/ bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo // rgyal pos yan lag thams cad kyis byugs nas ldan pa shams pa nyid la 'dug tu bcug ste/ de'i don tu chu bcags ca 'angs
189b5(1): 'azas bu brtags pa gcangs byas te/ zar bcug go// che dang ldan pa 'char gas mchog tu ba ni bangang/ 'dul lnga ba nas pa dang ldan nang/ ji skang rjes su bstan pa'i chos bzhin longs spyod do// rgyal pos de la brtags
189b6(1): nas ngo mchar skyes te smras pa/ 'char kas gzhon don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar ni ba yin nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang / nye bar ni ba ni cung zad tsam lags so// dper na ji lta bu'i byu
189b7(1): srungs 'bru bzhin no// rgya mtsho dang ni mig rjes bzhin no// nyi ma dang ni srir bu ma khyer bzhin mo// rnam par dang pacu'i rtsa ba'i drug pazhin mo// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gnon don thams cad grub pa yang 'di rje
189b8(1): mig no byad 'di 'dra'am lha 'di 'dra zhing ma bud 'di 'a'o// rgyal po zas gtsang brgyang rnams la 'brel ba dang / chu mang du btang nas dbugs sur byung ste smras pa/ 'char ka gzhon nu dron thams cad grub pa byon nam/ 
190a1(1): 'char ka sa smras pa/ lha byon no// dus ji srid cig na dgung bdun na'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par
190a2(1): 'gyur gyis rgyal po'i khab dang bro zang byi dor byos shig/ 'char kas smras pa/ lnga bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do// rgyal pos smras pa/ gang du bzhugs/ 'char kas smras pa/ 
190a3(1): dgon pa'am gtsug lag khang du'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal rnabla bris te bstan to// de nas rgyal po
190a4(1): blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' rab rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang khang phran drug cu rtsig tu chug shig/ lha bka' bzhin 'chal zhes
190a5(1): blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang las me nyan nas/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu rtsig tu bcug go// de nas
190a6(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen zol 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'tshal gyi bu sang la/ dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhing gshegs te
190a7(1): yab sras gdan 'jom na/ khyed cag las su nig blta bar sngo bde chos gos dag long shig ces bskang shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'chal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gol gi bu chen pos bcom
190a8(1): ldan 'das rgyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser sgra'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras gdan 'jom na/ khyed cag las su lwa bar spro bar rngam sen
190b1(1): ngag long shig ces bka' stsal pa/ de na bcom ldan 'das du la ba/ 'khor dul bzhi pa 'khor zhing/ grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs 'byin pa 'khor dbugs 'byin pa/ 
190b2(1): rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog pa langan
190b3(1): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang po'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor bu/ seng ge che ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor blta bu/ ngang ba'i rgyal po ngang pa'i rgyal ba tshogs kyis bskor blta gru
190b4(1): nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo ru ba'i tshogs kyis bslang
190b5(1): ba lta bu/ lam mkhan 'dron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i
190b6(1): rgyal po bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ skab rgya skar kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od gzer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor skyong dri ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul/ 
190b7(1): bram gyi tshogs kyi bskor blta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor blta bu/ thag bzangs ris lha ma yin gyis tshogs kyis bsgom
190b8(1): me g+ha ru mergya byin sum tsum gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mcho ga yo re med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang chas pa la bu/ glang pongam
191a1(1): brdegs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul mkhrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang
191a2(1): bo brgyad dus rnam par mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sgra/ nyi ma'i 'od gzer stong badri lhag 'di cen/ rin po che'i ribo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang
191a3(1): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang thugs rje chen po dang ldan la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu 'ab bcur ci kar byon te/ rgyal po phas
191a4(1): gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'ab ba chu ro hi kar byon te zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir rdob dang gyo mo dang seg ma rnams bsal nas
191a5(1): tsam ngan gyis chus chag chag btab pa/ dri shin tu zhim pa phog por nye bar bshams pa/ dar gyi chun byang mang po dpyangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hi kas gang yang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar
191a6(1): sam shin tu mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs langs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra bdag sham du bcug go// de 'bab chu ro hi ka la dge slong kha cig ni lag pa lezhu bar byed/ kha cigs zhing / 
191a7(1): 'dor bar byed do// kha cig ni khrus byed do// ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegs so zhes thos so// zos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i
191a8(1): rtsa bas bstsal ba/ khacig ni ya mtshan skyes nas/ thams cad na gro d+ha'i kun dga'ar ba nas byung ste/ ci ya ba sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam/ 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byeng ba la
191b1(1): bal sem mo// 'dul ba gci/ dum thu bzhipa mtho dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldam 'disam du dgongs te/ la
191b2(1): dazhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir gshegs na/ shAkyang rgyal rnams kyis/ kye ma 'o gtsu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyis nags su gshegs nas rtogs pa zhig grub pa lta zhig suM
191b3(1): de lha stong phrag du mas zhab 'bring byas nas steng gi nam mkha' la gshegs te/ dus de sring du dka' ba brgya stong spyad nas bdud rtsi thob nas/ nga zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad par gyur ro// 
191b4(1): snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ shar phyogs kyi steng gyi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste 'chag pa dang
191b5(1): bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang mnal bar mdzad do// me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad de/ mo'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
191b6(1): 'das kyi sbal 'od ga por rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin par ma dang de/ 'di lta ste sngon po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang dkar po dang / lebargan dang shel gyi kha dog ga go// tshe 'phrul zung du yang sbyin par/ 
191b7(1): mdzang de/ sku'i skud nas me 'bar bar mngang / sla'i song sa chugrang ma'i sbyin 'dribs par mdad do// rlung slong nas me'abu ba mdangal/ sku'i skang nas rgya bang mo'i rgyan 'babs par mdza
191b8(1): des dri'i ting 'dzin la sgoms par bzhugs pa par phyog sa sa ji lta bar slong nga chung dang / drung thugs su mdza ba zhinano// phyogs pazhir rje 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul ma pa bani bstananas
192a1(1): rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsdus nas/ ta la bdun gyi srid tsaman bzhugs so// dge slong rnams ni tal drug gi steng na'o// bcom ldan 'das ta la drug
192a2(1): gi srid tsaman ni/ dge slong rnams ni lnga'i sringad tsamana'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsaman ni/ dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i sring tsam na ni
192a3(1): dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das sum gyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/ 
192a4(1): dge slong rnams tal gcig gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi sring tsam na bzhugs na ni/ dge sbyong rnams drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug ni
192a5(1): srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ 
192a6(1): dge slong rnams ni gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni// dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/ 
192a7(1): dge slong rnams mi gang lhag tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams sa la'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'tshe 'phrul de lta bu de dang / 
192a8(1): dge slong mang po mthong nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa cher kyis smras pa/ 'char ka 'di na ngur smri gzom
192b1(1): ba'i bar du mang po zhig yod ma de la gnon nu gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das snyan nas smras pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags srid pa'i mthar
192b2(1): byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags 'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed de nyid don ni kun tu ston mdzad lags/ 'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mnga' bas
192b3(1): kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/ dri med btsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang dag gzigs shig/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btung na zhabs la
192b4(1): phyag byas te/ tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/ kun spyad zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ bltams pa'i che na sa ni g.yos pa dang
192b5(1): 'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o// de nas shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams kyi so bo zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btug pa mthong nas/ da ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag
192b6(1): byed pa ci'i tha tshig ces ma dad pa skyes so// rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la bgo bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dgang 'dong kho bos gzhon nu don thams
192b7(1): cung grub pa'i napas la phyag byas pa yin te/ gang gi che gcon nu don thams cad grub pa balngam pan/ sa chen po g.yos par gyur cing / 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang rgya chen pos bca
192b8(1): bar gyur to// 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun gnag skrag tu gyur pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyams su
193a1(1): myong ba gang yin pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos bsal bar gyur nas/ der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can dgra gcig gis
193a2(1): gcig mthong nas/ shes ldan dag 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta/ shes ldan dag 'dir sems can dag kyang skyes pa lta zhes ngo shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos byang chub sems
193a3(1): dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so// gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa/ zhing las kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs nas/ 'dod pa rnam las dbyen pa/ 
193a4(1): sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs
193a5(1): te bzhugs pa na/ shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogs su gzhol/ shar phyogasu 'bab/ shar phyogasu bab kyang / shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub semA dpa'i sku la ma 'das pa gyur pa de'i tshe yang
193a6(1): ngo mtshar rmad byung ba'i chos des/ kho bos yi mid bsdus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so// de bas na 'di skad ces blo
193a7(1): gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni/ kun spyad zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ bltam pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang / 'dzam bu'i grib ma las ma 'das pa'o// zhes smra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
193a8(1): kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul nas/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas
193b1(1): gtsang srad 'dzer cing snying dang mi mchi mas gang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ gzhal med khang gis gnas rnams las/ yab kyi khang na bzhugs pa las/ 
193b2(1): dgon pa 'jigs dang bcas rnams su/ ji ltar bur ni 'ba' zhig bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi'i bdag po gang du ni/ khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba// 'phags pa yi
193b3(1): ni gnas pa bcu// thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa// bso gser gyi rtsa ba can// shin tu bde ba bting ba yi// khril mnal bar mdzad pa las// gding ba la ni ji ltar mnas/ 
193b4(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rgyal po rnam grol ba nas mal ni// dga' ba byang chub yan lag gi/ me tog bkram par chags med cing // yongs su gdung ba rnam spangs mnal// rgyal po zas
193b5(1): gtsang gis gsol pa// dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni// gser dngul bum pas khrus mdzad na// rnyog pa can la dro yi/ chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ 
193b6(1): go ru tam dang ba'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med/ bsod nams 'jug dog dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus na// lus mi shes par pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po zas gartsa
193b7(1): gis gsol pa// dpa' bo khyod sngon sngon ser swA yi// tsan dan gyis ni sku khrus shing // ka shi'i mchog nas mdzes pa las/ de dang bral mdzes ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
193b8(1): tshul khrims nga'i rgyan yin te// tshul khrims nyid ni byug pa yin// gser dang nor burna cha dag/ rmongs skyed ngal ci zhig bya// rgyal pos gsol pa// dpa' ba nyid kyi phazang na// glang za
194a1(1): shing rnga rtas bzhud pa// cher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la// zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga'i shing rnga rdzu 'phrul rkang / 
194a2(1): yang dag rtsol ba'i bzhon pa yis// sa kun rnam pa rgyu yang ni// nyon mongs 'cher mas gnod pa med// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka/ na bza' bsnams na mdzes pa
194a3(1): las// ngur smrig rtsub pa'i gos bsnams pa// ji ltar khyod kyi sku'i bzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes// khrel yod nga'i bsnabs sbyar te// de bgos thub
194a4(1): pa zhi ba rnams// nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// 'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhong pa nas// du ma'i ro ldan 'bras chan gsol ba las// 'di ltar
194a5(1): gtso bo da ltar bsod snyoms ni// phal ba gsol pa ji ltar mgur tu mchi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka stsal pa// zas kyi sred pa thams cad spangs nas ni// nges par 'byung dang mnyam par
194a6(1): gzhag ldan pa'i// da ni chos kyi ro mchog sol mod kyi// 'jig rten kun la brtse phyir spyod do// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// mgur du bde mang bgyid pa'i// rgun skyems kha ra'i chab
194a7(1): gsol na// rnyog pa can la dro ba yi// cha ba ni ji lta zhig tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi'i bdag po gang 'thungs na// bdag la 'thung ba thams cad ni// dug dang 'dra bar
194a8(1): snang byur ba/ chos kyi romacho gang btung ngo // rgyal ba bas gcang gi gsol pa// 'di ltar khyod ni sngon bsil khang gang nal me khadang/ khang bzangs stong mji lha'i dus bzhin bzhugs da lta ga gyi
194b1(1): bu na gras khrong khrod bzhugs pa/ ngi skar blo bzangs ji war bzengs pa med par bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ go'u ta ma 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin te// drim pag chags
194b2(1): btsam parab spangs pas// nga ni mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te// nga 'dzin 'jigs pa cung zad med// rgyal po bas gtsang gi gsol pa// khyod sdom khrus langazhin tu ying 'ong ba// khrus
194b3(1): mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtags bsil na// gcig po khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par// thub dbang da ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
194b4(1): go'u ta ma chos kyi mtsho phran dri med pa// rdul khrims 'jug ngogs dam pas sngags pa ste// de la rig pa'i yon tan mi bkrus na// lus mi sher bar pha rol rab tu rgyal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis
194b5(1): gsol pa// gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsod// gang las 'jigs su rung ba ste// yid 'byung ba yang gang las skye// zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
194b6(1): gang gis ni khyang gsod dang // gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang // gang las yid 'byung skyes pa dag/ nyon cig yab la bshad par bya// rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste// gal te 'di gsum
194b7(1): yod minam nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i// yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ shAkya rnams kyis rigs dga' ba/ 
194b8(1): legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa' bo legs// khyod ni 'khrig rten chos brgyad kyis// ji lta bur yang mgos so// de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas/ 
195a1(1): drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni/ thub pa'i zhabs la mgo rjes phyag byas te/ bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug/ de nas rgyal
195a2(1): po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag go bus yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ni/ bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nA g+ho d+ha'i kun dgra'
195a3(1): nga bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bgal nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun
195a4(1): bdun stong gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i zas bu mngon tu byas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtogs to// lha sbyin nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas/ 
195a5(1): khro bo'i kun nas dkris pa dang bcas pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i sgyums dbang du byed par shes na/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig/ de la
195a6(1): de rnams kyis gshegs pa'i tshig gis sbas pa/ lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu tsho ba yin gyis/ de skad ma spa shig ces bzlog nas/ cang mi sba bar 'dug go/ tshangs
195a7(1): bas bskar ba'i snying mas tshal du 'dis 'i tshis bzhid pa mdzad pa las gas pa shA 'dum tho bdu stong gis n+d+ha du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma na sa ma du byas
195a8(1): banas/ yang sun pa 'an banin du 'a mer po//  ci 'i byed mamachal du 'di ga bu'i chom pasha pa mdzad do// dnges pas rgyal pa lami gci ma gtogs par bdud rtsi mthos na/ 
195b1(1): bshAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyur du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na/  sgyid de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro// 'khor lhag ma rnabs las/ kha gcig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu se
195b2(1): bskyed do// kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu// kha cig gis ni rgyud du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas
195b3(1): kha cig gis de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni bying po 'ong 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyo mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra btsam par gyur/ khatshig ni
195b4(1): ni sangs rgyas pa stabs sa stong// 'jig gis chos pa 'jig gis ni dge 'dun gas/ 'gyu de dag tshor sangs rgyas la gnas/ chos la bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod de/ 
195b5(1): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di sasnyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pa dang / mchod pa dang / brjed pa dang / mngon du smra bar gyur na/ da lta ni mi
195b6(1): mchod kyi lngas ni ma yin no snyam mo// de nas shAkya gzhon nu nig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang srong chen po smra mchog dam chos kyis/ char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad
195b7(1): do// mi bzod lam du ltung ba'i 'jig rten 'di/ drangs te thar pa'i lam la sbyar bar mdzod/ rgyal po 'di skadab du/ bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar ma
195b8(1): che ba len na sams/ dag par dga' bas bden pa ma mamadzang // tsham ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rgyal thabs gangs gis ci'i phyir bden pa ma mdzangasam palas de 'dis sa
196a1(1): du bdag gi bu'aba' zhig 'di skar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu re ba yin no snyam ste/ lhag par dga' ba las gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa sdong du gzhug go// rgyu gnyis kyis bden
196a2(1): pa rnams mthong bar mi gyur te/ ha cang zhum pa dang shin tu dga' ba'o// de la zhum pa sems dang shin tu dga' ba yod kyis/ ma langs de'i zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba gnyis song du gzhag na
196a3(1): snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang soms shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan
196a4(1): pa mthu 'gal gi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rgyang ring po
196a5(1): nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mthu 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mthu 'gal gi bu chen po tshur spyon// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po khyad byon pa legs so// 
196a6(1): btsun pa ra'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gad ni bzhugs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ de nas tshwa dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji
196a7(1): sngar me'i ting nge 'jim ba sgoms par bzhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa mdze 'gal gyi ba chen po'i lus las 'dag zer rnam pa ste tshogs dga' byin par byed de/ 'di lta sa sngon po dang ser za ma
196a8(1): dmar po dang leb rgan dang / shel gyi the ga ga no// chos 'phrul brang du yang ston par byed de/ lus kyi srad nas me 'bar bar byed/ lus kyi sang nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do// 
196b1(1): lus kyi sang nas ma 'bar bar byed pa/ lus kyi srad ras chu klung ba'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa deg bu'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par bzhugs sa// zhang phyogs pa'i sa ba bzhin du sna dang rub rang
196b2(1): khyad phyogs su yang de bzhin no// phyogs pazhing rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul rnams pa bzhi bas na nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsus te/ stan bshams la 'dug go// de nas rgyal pa
196b3(1): bas btsang gis che dang sar pa mtha'agal hU~M chen pon 'di ska sa smras pa// brgya ba babu 'gal gyibu chen po// bcom ldan 'dres kyis nyan thos 'di sang rdzu 'phrul che ba mtshacha
196b4(1): gzhan yang mchis lags sam// rgyal po chen po mchis so nas tshigs su bcad do smras pa/ mthu che ba dang gsum rig dang / sems can gyi rnam grangs shes pa dang / zag zad dgra
196b5(1): bcom gang yin pa/ thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de/ 
196b6(1): 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod dos ma nas/ de nyid tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten ba'i thugs bskyed
196b7(1): ba mdzad do// kye brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pad+ma rnams 'ongs nas/ ba'i 'khod dag pa la chos bshad de snyam pa dang / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
196b8(1): rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs skyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ srog chags slar rnams kyi sems kyis tshang / bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa zhes pa brgya byin dang tshanges pa
197a1(1): dus klu sa na ts+tsha gas sa / ga nas rnags tha mas kyisasag shes/ de nas sa rnams kyi bang thal
197a2(1): 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chung ba bzhed do/ 
197a3(1): snyam nas/ des lha'i bu bzo thams cad la bsgo ba bzo thams pa/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad par bzhed kyis/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i
197a4(1): khang brtsag gA ma/ gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyi mchog tu bzang po zhes lta bu bzang po thams cad pas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin las mnyan
197a5(1): te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig tu sprul to// de la rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khod pa ni yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phag
197a6(1): skyes pa dang / mig mi bzad dang / lus ngan po ste/ shar skor ni yul 'khor skyong / dpung rgyan dang rna cha gdu ba'i khor dang / 'phreng ba dang rgyadar sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// lho phyogs na ni
197a7(1): 'phags skyes po lnga rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// byang phyogs na ni was ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ 
197b1(1): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgya bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang ra ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par
197b2(1): gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lnga brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs te/ lha'i 'khor bal pa
197b3(1): gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyun pa'i seng ge'i khril bzhugs so// de nas de tshe dang ldan pa mo'o 'gal gyi bu chen po rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder
197b4(1): deng ste phyin nas/ tshe dang wAn+d+ra bA mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang la/ rgyal po chen po lal 'khor stong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar
197b5(1): sdod cig ces bzlog go// ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ rgyal po bdag ni
197b6(1): yul 'khor skyong ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pas mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gnang
197b7(1): gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ 'phags skyes pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bodag ni 'phags skyes pa'o// ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dgu pa la chos
197b8(1): 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po bzas gtsang nu bskor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzong gis mthing nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang
198a1(1): ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis sbas pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig rgyal po chen po bdag ni mig mi ba'ang ngo // ci phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i
198a2(1): 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der ming 'gyur ba 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zos gtsang byang song song ba dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus mthong nas smras pa/ 
198a3(1): rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdud cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag khyod su zhig/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'
198a4(1): ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der ming gyur pa 'jug tu mi dpung ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kyi ma'o// bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos
198a5(1): 'chad pa de bdag gis blta'o// skam po'i 'dod pa skyes so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi zhum pa'i rgyu gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas
198a6(1): btsang gis gal te ma mthong na/ khrag rnon pa sgrags nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa yod kyis/ de la thabs shig bshams par bya'osam nas/ bcom ldan 'das rin
198a7(1): po che sna bzhi'iri khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa rdo/ shel las byas par sprul pa dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku bsgrib pa med par mthong ba'o// mthong nas kyang dag
198a8(1): ba dang mgub skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bas gtsang gi bsam pa dang / ngaH/ 
198b1(1): gnyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags pa'i bad pa nis mang rtogs par 'gyur bde/ des bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'chi/ 
198b2(1): tshogs la bsre ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mthob/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes btsam nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon gsum du byas te/ de bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa med du
198b3(1): brjod pa/ btsun pa bdag la phas ma bgyis mas ma bgyis/ rgyal pos ma legs/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma
198b4(1): lags/ sdug pa dang rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa/ gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/ rus pa'i ri
198b5(1): po las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ bdag lha dang mi rnamasu ni bzhag go// yang gsol pa/ pha la lan du phan 'dogs pa/ dam pa'i bus ni
198b6(1): bgyi ba gang / khyod kyis bdag la mdzad lags te/ sems ni 'grol bar gzhol bar bgyis/ khyod kyis bdag gi ngan 'gro las/ drangs te mthor sa thar pa la/ sgrim mi 'tshal bar bzhag lags te/ 
198b7(1): khyod kyis dka' ba mdzad pa legs/ mgon po byams pa khyod kyis ni bdag ni tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar/ mtha' ris rnyed pa'i lus dang ni/ longs spyod dag ni rnyed pa mdzad/ de nas rgyal po bas gtsang stan
198b8(1): las langs te/ blo gros phrag pa gcig tu babar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bder logs su thal mo sbyang ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
199a1(1): dge bdu dang bas cig tu yang bdag gisum 'a de ga dugs tshang byung zhing mad+his na/ gnang bar mang drugs pa/ btsam ldan 'das kyis rgyal pobs gcang la cang mi gsung bas
199a2(1): nang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rin/ tshe nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga
199a3(1): nas chags te zas dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas zas dkar la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu rgyas rgyal srid thob kyis rgyal srid khyer cig/ ci'i slad du ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
199a4(1): sngang bden pa mthong bas so// gang gi gdugs la lags/ de ring kho na'o// bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das gang gi nyi ma la/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar ches bshad pa de'i nyi ma la/ shA
199a5(1): bdun khri bdun stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong ba lags/ de bzhin du the bo zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces sbas pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gis ces kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi
199a6(1): tshangs pas bskor ba'i bskyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe/ shAkya bdun khri drug stong dang bden pa mdzad lags so// de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid khyer rig ces smras pa dang / des smras
199a7(1): ba bdag gis kyang gang gi tshi bcom ldan 'das kyis ro hi ta ka'i bsrid mas mal du chos bshad pa 'di'i tshe/ shAkya bdud khril song dang lhan cig bden pa mthang lags so// gal te des
199a8(1): gyur na/ da su zhig rgyal srid la bzhag/ de rnams kyis sbas pa// shAkya'i rgyal po babang ldan gyis bgyi'o// zhes de rnams 'dus nas 'argya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rgyal srid kyis dbang phyug
199b1(1): la dbang bskur ro// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan monas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdags gon byas nas/ nang par sngar langs te/ gdan pa zhams
199b2(1): shing nor ba chu snad ba nag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gdugs chod lags na/ da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsal
199b3(1): de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' shams thabs bsdams/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsdams te/ dge slong gi tshigs kyis yongs su bskur cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
199b4(1): mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po
199b5(1): zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsad pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas stobs shing 'chim par
199b6(1): byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi la gnas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/ phyag byas
199b7(1): lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' rab phral lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis
199b8(1): yin sde pa mdzad pa/ sbyin pa'i bas nams gang yin 'dis/ blas rnams kyis bemams pa yi/ yidal rab rdzogs nas ni/ rtag pa'i gangs rmitho'i per nag/ de nam sa
200a1(1): ldan 'das ser skya'i bzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na ban bzhugs so// de bzhin du gnas brtan nams kyis kyang // mdo sdel bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi
200a2(1): shing nagro d+ha'i kun nas dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes gdags par byas so// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid na bzhugs nas/ nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs chod
200a3(1): gsol nyi ma cig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol lo// rgyal po zas gtsang gis ral pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na/ dka' thub drag pa'i brtu
200a4(1): zhugs kyi khyad par du bdag gis lus gdungs pa las lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba/ 
200a5(1): yin mod kyi lus mdzes pa ma yin na/ 'khor ji 'dra ba zhig gis bcom ldan mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las/ des bsams pa shAkya'i 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas/ des shAkya thams cad
200a6(1): bsogs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te gzhon du don thams cad grub pa rab tu byung bar ma gyur na ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// khyod cag ci zhig byed par 'gyur/ g.yon/ 
200a7(1): bgyid par 'gyur ro// da ltar gnon nu don thams cad grub pa budar med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur na/ khyed cag ci'i phyir ga yog mi byed/  ci rab tu byung ngam/ rab tu byung shig/ ci tha ba
200a8(1): cad dam/ khyim re re nas re re'o// bka' bzhin 'tshal/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhing dril sgrogs su bcug pa/ rgyal po'i gzhi nas nga'i yul na gnas pa'i 'ak+Shu
200b1(1): kyis khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shes/ de skad ces bka' stsal to// the bo bsal bu gnyis yod pa ma 'gags pa dang ming can mo// ming can ni zhing las kyi mtha' 'a lhag par brtson no// 
200b2(1): 'gags pa ni steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas skyes pa med pa'i rol mas rtse bar byed dga' byed/ mga' mgur spyad par byed do// ming can lams smras pa/ bu rgyal pos dril
200b3(1): sngogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyib de nas ri re rab tu byung shig ces bsgon khyod rab tu byung shig/ des sbas pa/ bdag ni rab tu mi byung gis/ khyod kyi bu sdug pa bde ba dang ldan
200b4(1): par gnas pa gang yin pa der ba byung shig/ bsod nas kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sebs can de la khyod 'gran ma 'tshal cig/ yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang / 
200b5(1): thang can lags mod/ de ring de la cung zad kyang ma sman dang / jo bsad nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sam/ ma lags mngon du par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byas te/ yid
200b6(1): bar bya'o// des gzeb stong parje'us gis btang nas kha ras dkar pos bkris te rgya skyegs la rgyas btab nas/ bum mngag gzhug ma'i lag tu bskur zhes bsgog gal te de na/ 
200b7(1): ci yod ces 'dri dang ji yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig/ des de khyer nas song ba dang / de lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/ des
200b8(1): bsams pa/ rang sangs rgyas kun shes pa bas de snyoms phul ba gang yin pa de deng ci'i phyir zas kyis 'phongs par bya/ de'i zin sbyar bar bya'o zhes/ des rje'u de rnams su sran chod
201a1(1): dang tshad mas tshogs ro dang ldan pa dang / zas kyis bkang ngo // ji tsam na mang gi gzhug ma des khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i drung du byin pa dang / des smras pa/ phra ba'ani
201a2(1): na ci yod des smras pa/ gzhon nu ci lang ma mchis so// ma 'gags pas bsams pa/ bdag lam byas na 'di stong par ci sre bskur/ gdon mi za bar 'di ni ci yang ma yin
201a3(1): pa'i zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re shig blta'o// zhes ji tsam na kha phye ba dang / skyed mos tshal de thams cad zas kyi dri zhim bris gang bar gyur te/ de bsdams nas ma 'gag
201a4(1): pa muchog tu ya mtshan skye'o// de ma la gus pa yin pas des ma wa zas kyi phud bskur nas spring pa/ yum gdugs tshod re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di lta bu dag bskur
201a5(1): ba'i rigs so// des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te/ des ming cad la bstan nas/ bu mthong ngam/ yul mthong lags so// khyod la khoms sngar bsod nams kyi dbang nga
201a6(1): chen po'i sems can mi'i skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa la khyod mgron mtshol cig ces ma sbas sam/ des smras pa/ yum bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung ba ldan yang rung
201a7(1): bdag ni rab tu mi byung ngo // zhes ji ltar ming can gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu byung bang khas len du ma btub bo// de nas des ma 'gags pa la sbas pa/ bu rgyal pos dril sgrog tu
201a8(1): bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim re nas re re rab tu byung shig ces bskong khyod ci rab tu byung ngam/ 'on te khyim par 'dug/ des smras pa/ yum rab tu byung ba la phan yon ci mchis/ nyes dmig
201b1(1): ni mchis/ khyim bu byung bas pa yon d+hI chis/ nyes dmigs kyi mchis/ thang ba tu byung ba sa lags par bsgrubs na/ mya ngan las 'das bathob par 'gyur ro// legs par ma
201b2(1): sgrubs na lha dang mi thob par 'gyur ro// khyim par 'dug sde legs par bskyangs na/  dang mi thob bo// ma sbyangs na sems can dmyal ba dang / dur 'gro dang yi dgas thob bo// 
201b3(1): yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang legs pa de ni/ khyim na gnas pa'i phod yon lags pas/ de bas na khyim na gnas pa'i mi 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu byung // 
201b4(1): smras pa/ bre legs kyis de gyis shig/ ma 'gags pa'i me'u zla shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan yin pas de de'i drung du song ngo // de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pa de wang len te/ de bawang
201b5(1): ldan pa las rgyud chad nas/ sgra gzhan du gyur to// ma 'gags pa'i pi wang len pa la byang ba yin pas/ des sgra ji 'dra bar gyur pa'i rtags bzangs nas de sbyor bsdad de/ skyo srungs kyi
201b6(1): mi la smras pa/ kye nang rje song la rgyal po bzang ldan lam 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas/ sgon sdod cing mchis so zhes gsol cig/ so srungs song nas/ shAkya'i rgyal po
201b7(1): babang ldan la smras pa/ lham 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'chal na/ chabaskon sdod cing mchis so// des smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gas pa las 'gog/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa
201b8(1): nang du mthong shig/ de nang du bzhugs pa dang / rgyal pos khyud nas 'dug tu bcug go/ des smras pa/ khyod 'dis nas ji srid len de sbas pa// gang gi tshe khyod pi wang len pan rgyud
202a1(1): chang nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so// de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas des smras pa/ khyod pi wang len pa nas byang ba yin no// shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis sbas pa/ 
202a2(1): gnon du don ci zhig la longs/ ma 'gags pas smras pa/ lha rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogs su bcug pa shAkya rnams las khyim de nas re re rab tu byung shig par bsgo bas/ des khyod kyi
202a3(1): mkhyen par mdzod cig rab tu byung ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na kho bo yang rab tu byung te grogs bya ba yod kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid du gnas thob shig/ de de nyid du gnas btab
202a4(1): mal cha bas rims bag gi dri can gos kyis ba ting zhing me tog gi sal mas kram pa'i mal du ma 'gags pas nyal ba dang / de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyam su tshor nas
202a5(1): smras pa/ ci 'di'i 'og na rdo phre'u yo dam/ de rnams kyis brtag par brtsams pa na/ me tog gis rtsa ba zhig mthong nas/ de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so// ma 'gags pa mtshan mo maM
202a6(1): bde zhing nyal bas nam langs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ma 'gags pa cig bde bar gnyid log gam/ des smras pa/ lha bde bar gnyid ma log go rgyal pos smras pa/ ci'i phyir ma 'gag
202a7(1): pas smras pa/ lha rims bag gi dri can gyi gos bting bar/ me tog gi bsil ma bkram pa'i me tog gi rtsabs lus sdang lags so// rgyal pos mal chab bkug nas/ khyod kyis rims pag zhi
202a8(1): drin na gogs pating sa ci bya/ mal rlabs sbas pa lu bdag ya ka bas pakang ba lags sa/ rgyal pas dkar ba bkug nas sbas pa/ khyod kyis rims pag gi dri ca kyigs pas sa
202b1(1): des smra pa/  sa ldan pa sa gnas smram pa/ byang rgya byung sa gan kun rgyags 'thab rdug pas smras pa/ sgyum mthas
202b2(1): pa'i ba chud zhi gagus par bdag ribs kyis thabs pazhid bkyis nga lags sa// rgyal bas sbas pa/ gzhon du khyod kyis 'i ltung zhes/ des sbas pa/ tsha ba'i rig pa nyams su myong bas/ 
202b3(1): rims bag gi dri lags so// rgyal po mchog tul mtshan skyes ste smras pa/ shes ldan ma 'gags pa ni shAkya'i skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa yin no// de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis sbas
202b4(1): pa/ gzhon nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung na la sbyin shAkya rnams kyi rgyal por gyur to// de shAkya rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur gyis/ mal bdag cag thams cad 'dus la/ lha sbyin spo ba bskyed
202b5(1): par bya'o// zhes shAkya rgyal pabazang ldan gyis bkug ste/ de nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa/ lha sbyin kho bo nag thams cad rab tubyung na khyod ci byed/ las sbyin gyis bsams pa/ gso
202b6(1): rab tu mi 'byung ngo // zhes sbas na/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu byung bar mi 'gyur gyis/ de la thabs shig bshams par bya ste bsra'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi/ 
202b7(1): nyi ma la ragra d+hA'i kun dga' ra bar sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa ji ltar 'di'i sgyums skye bo'i tshigs chen pos dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang du bya
202b8(1): zhes pasoms so snyam nas sbas pa/ khyed cag rab tu byung na bdag ci ste 'dug/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzing ldan gyis sbas pa/ 'di ni brdzun du smra ba yin gyis/ ngam bcad bcug la/ 'gro ba sa
203a1(1): pos song rig par bya'o sab po// de nas rgyal pos tshig re gleg phu la bris nas grong khyer ser s+ya'i gzhing dril srog tu bcug pa/ grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shes
203a2(1): ldar dag nyon cig/ bzang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lhas sbyin la sogs te shAkya lnga brgya rab tu byung bar 'gyur gyis/ thos par bgyis la rab tu dga' bskyed
203a3(1): cig ces bska'o// lhas sbyin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal chen po dang yid mi bde ba chen po skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan nges par rab tu byung bar shes
203a4(1): bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig/ nga ni gal te rab tu mi byungadra na brdzun du smra ba yin no// zhes rgyal srid kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad du dus 'dir zad
203a5(1): dam ci sa rab tu byung la/ bdagar ba tu byang ba bzhin du la srid bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal srid bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya rnams
203a6(1): kyi tha ma'i 'byor pa la blta'o snyam nas/ des grong khyer gsog ma dang / gyo mo bsal/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag bta ba/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng / dar gyi chun phyang
203a7(1): mang po dbyangs/ shin tu dri zhim pa'i pog por nye bar bzhag/ me tog sna tshogs kyi bsil mas dga' dag ltar byed du bcugag/ de nas shAH brgya stong phrag du mas yongs
203a8(1): bskar ngas/ grong khyer gyis nga seng ge'i khril 'dug go// shAkyam dang shAkya gzhon nu mngo mtshar skyes pa rnams kyang / sar zang po mamaca ne dang / skar tha~Mng dang / su
203b1(1): bu dgag 'dug go/ shA kyarnams kyi 'byong bal ba khang 'dod pa'i sgra ba'i tshogs/ yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa dag kyang / lam pache dang / 'tshang 'dus dang / gzhi mdo
203b2(1): dang sum mdo rnams su 'dug go// shAkya las su dag gis ni mnyes par gyur/ su dag gis ni thugs dbyung bar 'gyur ba brtag pa'i phyir bram ze mtshan mkhan dang lhas mkhas dag bkug
203b3(1): go shAkya rnams do shal dang / gdub bu dang dpung rgyan dang / rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pha dang ma dag la bltas nas so so'i rtar zhugs te phyir byung bar brtsams nas/ shAkya'i
203b4(1): rgyal po bzang ldan sna la byung ba/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ re shig 'dris re mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nam gru dang ma 'gags pa la sogs
203b5(1): pa phyir byung na/ de rnams kyang mtshar mkhan nams kyis lung bstan to// de nas lhas sbyin phyir byung ste de phyir byung bar/ bya khros btsug ga nir bu phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ 
203b6(1): de rnarnams kyis smras pa/ 'di'i rtags dang sbyar na gdon mi bza' bar ston pa la 'khus nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ko ka la ka dang / khan dra ba bya dang / ka ta po ra ka dang / rgyal/ 
203b7(1): dang rgya mtshos sbyin rnams phyir byung ba na/ bong bu'i skang grag nas/ de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ 'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la tshig ngan pa rnams smras
203b8(1): nas dmyal bar gnas par 'gyur ro// nye dga' glang po che la zhon nas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa na/ mu tig/ ngo shal spang ba dang / de glang po che las babs te blangs so// de yang de dam/ 
204a1(1): kyis lung bsta pa/ 'di sacang 'dod ched ches pas sems cad dpral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas babang ldan dang / nam gru dang / ma 'gags pa dang / lha sbrid
204a2(1): la sogs pa shA kya lnga brgya po de rnams skyed mos tshal du dus ston la 'gro ba bzhin du bzang pos 'gran cing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal
204a3(1): te ngas shAkya rnams la dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung na/ kha cig gis ni mnyes par 'gyur/ kha cig gis mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur te/ gnyis par byed par mi 'gyur ba
204a4(1): gang dag yin pa de dag gzhan du da sems la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba ni/ thams cad srid pa mtha' ma yin pas/ ma la ngas thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang gzhi'i
204a5(1): las kyis rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen pa rdzogs su bzhug go snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal la/ dge slong slar skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams gsol pa dang / gzhi'i
204a6(1): las kyis rab du byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mnyan to// rgyal po zas gtsang gis
204a7(1): shAkya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na/ skra 'dreg par btang nas/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi skra 'dreg pa na/ deng bzung gnag cing ma chim
204a8(1): 'jig la/ skad mdzer cing dbugs brtsegs pa/ bor sna 'dreg par byed do// shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bde 'khor ci'i phyir du/ de snying rje rje skad du btsam chu ngung
204b1(1): dal bus tshig re nas smras pa/ lha bdag 'jam bu gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa'i mingal pa rnams la yang bstan bkur bgyid par 'gyur ba lta zhig/ 
204b2(1): khyed kyis spangs te/ gson pa bas ni gum mi bsngon// shAkya'i rgyal ba bzang ldan gyis smras pa/ nye bar 'khong khyod kyis rje bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te/ mchog gi
204b3(1): mya ngan ma byed cig/ ngas ji ltar mi phal pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes sbas nas/ des phyogs gcig tu ras bting nas shAkya gzhon nu rnams la smras
204b4(1): po/ shes ldan gzhon nu dag nyon cig/ 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis bdag cag la bkur bstir byas la/ bdag cag kyang skar khyim du mi gnas kyis/ rkyen rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen
204b5(1): tu ras kyi steng du song shig/ de rnabs kyis se ze do dang / dogal dang mgul rgyan dang gdu ba dang / dpung rgyan dang las sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyar khyad par can rnams ras
204b6(1): steng du phung po chen por srungs so// nye bang 'khod gyis de rnabs mthor gyis skra bregs te/ de rnabs khrus la dong ba dang / des bsams pa/ re shig gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang 'byor pa dang / 
204b7(1): yang tshol bab cing chung ma dang ldan la mdzad dang / bang mdzad kyis ngargyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu byung na/ bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// 
204b8(1): gal te bdag rigs ngan du bskyes na/ bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing / chu bo las rgal ba dang / sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i
205a1(1): phyir brtsal ba dang / 'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig snyam mo// 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas
205a2(1): kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzogs pa/ de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bris 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag par skyobs skyes pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'dreg
205a3(1): mkhon nye bar 'khor gdan pa der song ste phyin nas/ 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so// nye bar 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su
205a4(1): rgud cing 'dug go/ nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir da ltar gzhon nu 'di dag rigs dang / 'byor pa dang lang tshol bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/ mdzod dang bang mdzod dbang
205a5(1): gis rgyas pa yang spangs nas/ rab tu byung na bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni/ tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa
205a6(1): chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang / 'byor pa las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang / 'bad pa la brtson par bgyi ba zhig na/ bdag ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud
205a7(1): pAr mi 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bzhin bzangs thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rlab 'di la ni/ rigs snying por byed pa ma yin/ rus snying por byed pa ma yin/ rgyud snying por byed pa ma
205a8(1): yin/ thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni bsgrub pa snying par byed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs dang ni/ rgyud dang rus la rtogs mo mdzad/ 
205b1(1): 'das nas yun ring lon pa yi/ las rdabs la ni rtog par mdzad/ gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na chu
205b2(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snar dang dang / khyod bco bldan 'das kyis rab tu bying ba 'gyur ro// 'dug ba gni/ dumabu 'di'i/ bab po dgra 'acu rtsa gnyis pa// das
205b3(1): blangs so// de nas khos tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khong khrid do/ bcom ldan 'das gang da ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgabs phyag
205b4(1): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// btsur pa nye bar 'khod 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsten pa rdzogs pa/ dge slong dngos po'am la na/ 
205b5(1): brtse bas nye bar dgongs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu byung ba dang bser pa rdzogs par mdzad du gsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong chur shog tshangs par spyad pa/ 
205b6(1): spyod cig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i modo kho drir skra byi ba dang sngam sbyar gyon pa dang / lag pa lhung bzed dang / bya ma bram gyis 'brel ba dang / skra dang kha spu skyes nas zhag 'dron
205b7(1): lon pa tsam dang / dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta phreng gonas par gyur to// spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas chung shog/ bka' stsal pa/ ska byo sngam sbyar gyon pa'i
205b8(1): lus ldan zhing // mamodo la dbang po rab bzhir gnas gyur te// sangs rgyas dgongs par lus gzugs bkab par gyur// shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams ni rgan ripas ji lta bzhin du 'dud pa byed
206a1(1): / pas/ shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan bdud pa byed pa na/ nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin pa shes so// de nas des gdong bte ga ste gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dra
206a2(1): 'di ni nye bar 'khor lags na/ ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang bdud pa bgyi'am/ bcom ldan 'das byi ka' stsal pa/ bu nga la rgyal sngangs pa'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin te/ 
206a3(1): gi rgan gyis khyod kyis nga rgyal gyis dregs pa tshogs la btung cig/ des de'i rkang pa la gdugs pa na chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur to// sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yo
206a4(1): kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab ldeg/ kun tu ldeg rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mthu naM/ nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na/ shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mthu
206a5(1): na byang cha phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ dbus mthon mtha' dma'/ mtha' mthon da byas dma' bar gyur to// de ltar thams cad kyis rims kyis bzhin du
206a6(1): gdugs so// lha sbyin gyis mdud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba dang / bu nga rgyal spang ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba'i yin gyis thung cig/ des gsol/ bdag gis de'i rkang
206a7(1): pa la ma gtugs na/ khyod la gnod pa ci mchis/ shes ldan de mdud du ma btab ste/ der thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lha sbyin gyis bcug go/ dge slong rnams the rlom skyes
206a8(1): nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldar gyis nye bar 'khor la phyag bgyis pa na/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa
206b1(1): drug tu g.yos par gyur pa la gzigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ dge slong dag da ltar 'di 'ba' zhig ma zad / 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang
206b2(1): 'dis de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa na/ sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung bgrong 'khyer wa ra Na si na/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba'i byor pa dang rgyas pa dang
206b3(1): bde ba dang / lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na/ rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ de'i tshe wa ra Ni si'i grong khyer na srad tshod ma bzad mo zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa/ de'i drung bram ze'i
206b4(1): mdzes dga' zhes bya ba sod nas smras pa/ bzang po dga' mgur spyod kyis tshur shog/ des smras pa/ khyod li kar pa Ni lnga brgya yod dam/ des smras pa med do// song la kAR+sha pa Ni lnga brgya khyer te/ 
206b5(1): shog shig/ de de la 'byor pa med kyang / de de la lhag par chags pas dus su me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam par snga tshogs skyel bar byed pa dang / de de la sdug pa skyes so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig
206b6(1): na/ wa ra NA sir dus ston byung nas/ bud med thams cad gos dang 'phreng ba dang / rgyan rnams kyis klubs nas/ rang gi khyim na rtse zhing dga' ba mang pos gnas pa de bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dgra
206b7(1): mthong nas/ yi chad par gyur to// smad 'tshong ma bzang mos bsams pa/ de ring wa ra na sa'i mi rnams gos dang 'phreng ba dang / rgyan rnams kyis klu bas nas/ rang rang gi chung
206b8(1): ma rnams dang / lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ba/ bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' su zhig dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur zhes de de snyam du sems
207a1(1): @/ shes bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' gang na yod pa'i sa phyogs der 'ongs nas/ des de mthong ba dang / sngon gyi bya ba drin tu gzo bas yid bde ba skyed nas sbas pa/ bram ze'i
207a2(1): khye'u song la shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog dag khyer te shog shig/ bdag cag lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par bya'o// de shi ba las so so pa bzhin du dga' bas sems kyi rgyud ngo mtshar gyis bsdus nas
207a3(1): song ngo // de'i gzugs dang lang tshe dang / g.yer ba'i yon tan la brtags na mos shing shin pas mtshan thog thag gnyid ma log pa/ nam nangs pa dang / mtshan mo ga nyid kyis shin tu lci bar gyur
207a4(1): nas/ ji tsam nyid shar gyi bar du gnyid log nas/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi dus ston gyi ched du me tog thams cad bdus zin pa de'i tshe sad rwas me tog gi ched du/ phan tshun song ba na/ mu rnyed na
207a5(1): des shing shi ri sha zhes bya ba'i me tog dag khyer nas de'i drung du song ste tshig su bcad pas/ smras pa/ g.yang gzhi thogs pa bu mo mdzes dga' ni/ ma sha phyed med skyed gzhan snyoms las kyis/ de
207a6(1): ring shing rnams me tog rgyas dus mnga'/ sbyin pa'i me tog shir sha 'ad yAn no// de smras pa/ song la me tog gzhan dag khyer te shog shig/ 'dod pa rnams la se sor sten par byed pa ni/ kun tu
207a7(1): sbyor ba stsogs te de'i 'dod chags rab tu 'phel bas sros ka'i zla ba tha ma'i nyan par sprin med cing rlung mi ldang bar 'dug pa'i nyi ma phyed kyi dus na/ grong khyer nas shin tu thag ring ba'i yul dgon pa dge
207a8(1): tu mgo 'dren pa dang / dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len cing me tog bru'o// rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang ri dgas 'tsher du chas pa na de nyi ma'i zer rnon pos gdugs nas/ grib ma'i tshad du phyogs
207b1(1): der son pa ma/ de'i glus thos nas tshigs su bcad nas sbas pa/ steng nas nyi ma gdung byed cing // 'og nas bye ma gdung pa la// glu len pa khyed kyi lus la ni// ji phyir nyi ma'i gdung ba med/ mdzes
207b2(1): dgas kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni nyi mas ma gdungs te/ rtog pa yis ni bdag gdungs lags/ bye ba bya ba ma yin pas/ 'jig rten 'dir gdungs nyi ma min// rgyal pos bsam
207b3(1): ba/ bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni gdon mi za bar bsil bar byed pa'i gtam la mkhas pa zhig yin te/ des na nyi phye ce 'dug nas me tog bla'o snyam nas/ des de bkug taM smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re shi
207b4(1): 'di ni gdan mi za bar bsil bar byed pa'i gtam la mkhas pa zhig yin te/ 'des na nyi ma phye ce 'dug nas ma teg d+ha'o snyam nas/ She des de bkug te sbas pa/ za ze'i khye'u re shig bsil bar
207b5(1): byed pa'i gtam dag byos shig gnyan to// des bsams pa/ rgyal ba de ni gdon mi za ba ro lus gdungs pa yin te/ des na 'di skad smra'o// snyam nas/ des bsil bar byed pa'i gtam
207b6(1): pa sna tshogs de la sbas pa/ thos nas rgyal po lus kyi gdung ba dang / dral bar gyur to// rgyal po mngon par dga' bar gyur nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs
207b7(1): spyi bo nAs dbang bskur ba'i srogs sbyin pa gang yin la yun du phan cing gdags la rgyal srid byed kyis so// de nas rgyal po des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u de ring rgyal po'i pho brang du gnas
207b8(1): thob zhig dang / sang rgyal srid kyi phyed sbyin no// de'i rgyal po'i grong du lam bzang po byin nas/ de la nyal ba na bzang ma rjes su dran par sems shing rgyal srid byed pa de yang srad tshong
208a1(1): ma bzang mo'i phyir blang ngo snyam mo// yang bsams pa rgyal srid phyed po de la longs spyod pa'i rgyal po de ji 'dra ba zhig/ mal bdag gis de srog dang bral bar bya'o snyam ma/ 
208a2(1): yang bsams / pa/ rgyal po bsad pa'i rgyal srid gang yin pa des ci zhig bya sgrub nas tshigs su bcad do smras pa/ don ma grub na 'dod 'gyur la/ don grub 'dod pa ldog mi 'gyur/ 
208a3(1): ma grub na ni phongs gyur pas/ de bas don ni don ma yin/ ji tsam nam yongs su nye ba na/ de 'gyod pa skyes nas mal nas babs te g.yang gnyis la bting nas nyal la// nam langs pa

208b8(1): zhig mchisas// gang gi gang gasbyong gis rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa/ dran par byed pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po 'dod pagra nyam la sems kyang ba'i dzin/ 'dod pa zhen cing spyod pa la sras kyang ci dgosaH/

217a1(1): hAH// 'dod na/ nyes med 'gro ba rnams la smos ci dgos// de nas kA ra NA si'i lha gang yin pa des khams kyi nad dang byi ba dang / bye ba dang / ne tse rnams btang zhing lhas char ma phab pa
217a2(1): skye ba'i tshogs shi bar gyur to// rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas sbas pa/ shes ldan dag ci'i phyir lus char mi 'bebs shing / byi ba dang / byed pa dang / ne tse rnams rab tu mang por gyur nas skye
217a3(1): bo'i tshigs kyang bar gyur/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha drang srong bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pa'i de rab tu 'khrugs te/ de rab tu 'khrugs pas des yams kyi nad 'di btang
217a4(1): lagaso// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ lhas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gtor ma dang me tog 'phreng dang / yo byad rnams kyis lha rab tu 'khrugs pa mnyes pa
217a5(1): gyur pas gtor ma dad me tog 'phreng ba dang / yo byad rnams sbyar la lha dang drang srong de la yang bzod pa gsol bar bgyi'o// de nas rgyal pos wA ra Na sir dril sgrogs su gtsug pa/ grong khyer wa
217a6(1): NI sir na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyod cig/ skyed mos 'tshal na gnas pa'i dring srong bzod pa sba ba la mngon par dad pa des yams kyi nad btang zhing / des char mi 'bebs pa dang / byi ba dang byed pa dang
217a7(1): ni rnams rab kri bar byas te/ skye ba'i tshigs kyo shibang gyur gyis khams kyi nad de nye bar zhi ba bya ba'i phyir khyed cag gsang gtar ma dang me tog 'phreng dang / yo byad rnams dang chas se skyed thos ma

217b2(1): gsas te// de nas rgyal badzang srong 'azod pa sgra ba'i drung dus nas/ rkang pa lagatugs te/ bzod pagasol bar brtsams pa/ drang srong chen po bdag gi yul zhig la lhag par zhen pas khwa

217b4(1): mtshon gyis 'bebs na'ang // bdag ni sems can la byams pa// gal te khyod yid mi mchis na// bdag gi khrag 'dzag pa la ltos// de'i khrag 'o ma'i thibs par 'dzag pa// cho 'phrul rgyal ba sdig
217b5(1): pa'i las byed pa la bstun pa/ 'on kyang yid ches pas ma gyur nas/ des yang sbas pa/ drang srong chen po bzod par gsol lo// rgyal po chen po bzod do// sngas 'tshal/ de nas byang chub sems
217b6(1): dpas yan lag dang nying lag gtubs pa rnams gnas ji lta bzhin du bzhag nas bden pa gsol pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal po khyod kyis bdag gi gus// gtugs kyang shin tu phra ba 'i/ 
217b7(1): zhe sdang 'di ltar yang minan// bdag lus 'i ltar snga nu bzhin zhig/ 'des bden pa'i tshigags sobs lus sngo 'im bzhin du gyur te// de nas rtul po la mtshan gyi mig phye nas tshigs su bcad pas
217b8(1): sbas pa/ khyi ma chis la lags gnas sa/ khyi ma tshul grags 'di grangs// lus la gtub par byed pan/ khyod yi mi dga' tsha yang zad// rgyam za'ajab ma skyes ldan pa dang than pa
218a1(1): grong ba dang / yul mi dang bcas pas drang srang de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo // dge slong dag ji sam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang stong gang yin pa de ning nying yin

218a3(1): mongs pa gcod par gyur cig ces btab pa'i smon lam gang yin pa de'i dbang gis/ da ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pas de la chos bshad nas yang nas yang du smras so// dge slong dag de lta bas na

218a5(1): kyis lha brgyad khri chos kyi ros yang dag par bsdus te/ bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa bcom

218a7(1): de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di rnams chod pa brgyad khrir gyur pa na zang zing gis/ yang dag par bsdus nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la rab tu dkod pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag

218b1(1): nas/ de drang srong rnams kyi nang du byung ste/ des mtha' gcig tu brtson 'grus la gnas nas mkhan po dang slob dpon me dbang dang byang chub mngon sum du byas sa// de'i tsheng bang rnams ded dngon
218b2(1): ma mthong nas phan thun du btsal bar brtsams par/ gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad du ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ ded dpon thams cad skyob kyi drung du dong nas smras pa/ de dpan des ni bdag cag lam bltas

218b5(1): des de mthong nas dris pa/ khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshong pa rnams spangs te/ rab tu byung / bdag nyid chen po de dag lus kyi chos 'chad kyi/ ngag gis ma yin pas des ded dpon 'khor drang bcas

222a1(1): ma tsha yang ba yang ngas par rnams na ga ldan dbya ba'i tshul la/ btsun par bya bdag pa rnamapa pa dang ldan pa na gang las dpung na dang 'dunam/ kha na ma thab dang ldan pa ni 'byung ban/

228b1(1): cag las gang zhig sdod gang don tu gnyer ba de des long la dengs shig/ ces sbas ning des de las pa ma longs pa gnyis gso pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la dus dus su

228b4(1): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rdza mkhan dga' skyong la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu
228b5(1): dga' bar mdzad de// rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par dan bstan yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ yid dag par gzeng stod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad
228b6(1): nas cang mi gsung ngo // de nas rdzas mkhan dga' skyong yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 'od srung gis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'cha
228b7(1): te/ stan grangs nas song ngo // de'i bram ze'i blam shing rta thams cad nas dkar brta rgod mi dang ldan pa'i nang du zhugs te/ gser gyi khar ba dang ril ba dang thogs te bram ze'i khye'u tshogs kyis
228b8(1): yongs su bskor cing / bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis ltas te/ bai b+hi ding gi phyi rol tu bram ze'i khye'u rnams gsang tshig klog tu bzhugs pa 'dod nas/ bai b+hi dadi gnas byung ba dang / 
230a1(1): ji m+WAr byam ze'i khye'u bras 'di/ sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa dang / chos dang dge 'dum pa ngon par dad par 'gyur ba dag/ tha'i chos lags pang bshad pa gsal/ yang dag pa
230a2(1): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rdza mkhan dga' skyong la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
230a3(1): gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gta
230a4(1): gyis yang bar bstar/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // de das bram ze'i khye'u bla mas rdzu mkhan dga' skyong la
230a5(1): 'di skad ces smras so// nges pa dga' skyong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gya nom pa de 'di lta bu thos na/ khyod dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par ci'i phyir rab tu ma byung / 
230a6(1): des pa bla ma d+hi ltar kho bobam long ba gnyis gso pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la dus dus su bsod snyoms 'bul bar khyod kyis mi shes sam/ nges pa dga' skyong khyo rab tu
230a7(1): byang yang rung ba byung yang rung / re shig kho ba ni rab tu byung ngo // de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la/ rdza mkhan la dga' skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa zam
230a8(1): zi'i bla ma 'di lags par gsung ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bas nye bar gzung ste/ de
230b1(1): 'byung ba dang bsen pa rdzogs par mdzad dugs pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas patsam snang 'das 'ang skang gis/ rdzas pa 'dadag 'ang bcang mi gsung ba gnangang // danas rdza ma khan dga'
230b2(1): skyong gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan la langs nas sa/ 
230b3(1): ngongo// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rdza mkhan dga' stong song nas/ ring po ma lon par khongs su chud nas/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs par ma zad
230b4(1): de/ de bI ding gar ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ wa rat+na si'i ka shi gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rims kyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / wa ra NA si byon nas/ wA ra NA sir drang srong swa ba'i ri
230b5(1): dgas kyi nags na zhugs so// rgyal po kr-i kri si yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / wA ra NA sir byon nas/ wA ra NA sir drang srong skye ba'i ri dgas na zhag
230b6(1): so zhes thos naso// thos nas kyang wA ra NA sir nas byung ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
230b7(1): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal ba kr-i kris chos dang ldan pa'i
230b8(1): gtam kyis yang dag pang ston por mdzad yang dag 'dzin du 'jug par mdang / yang dag par gzeng bas dbang mdzad/ yang dag par rab tus no par mdzad do/ rnam grangs du mang ches dang ldan
231a1(1): pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug/ yang dag par bzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa nas/ cang mi gsung ngo // de nas rgyal
231a2(1): pokr-i kri stan las langs te bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar gnas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od sru
231a3(1): lal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cagri wa gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
231a4(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis/ rgyal po kri kril chang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po kr-i kris yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ 
231a5(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gzhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas/ stan langs te song ngo // de nas rgyal ba kre kris de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsad pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas
231a6(1): gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te/ gdan bshams pa nor bu'i chu snod d+ha/ gzhag nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od spang la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshed gsal bar btsun pa gdugs chod lags
231a7(1): te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par dgongs sugasal// de nas yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dron bza' bsams thebs lung bzed dang chos gos snrums te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis
231a8(1): yongs su bsrong cing / dge sdang gi tshogs kyis mdun du bdar nas/ rgyal po gro kri'i bkang sa gang na bder gshegs de byin nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan 'ashams nyid la bzhugs so// de na rkyes
231b1(1): po lo kris sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par riganas/ bcang zhing bsad pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag dang gags nas/ stobs shing rnyim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mang
231b2(1): bcang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag rang gi legs nas stabs shing tshim par byas so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis zhal zas gsol zin te/ phyog bcabs lhung bzed gyur/

235a8(1): lha 'aka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal bkro kril mnyan nas 'bras sog ma'i sbubs su smin pas shing rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste/ rdza mkhan dga' skyong gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rdza mkhan dga' skyong
